review_text: Fantastic spot - perfect Glenwood perch. Steps to hot springs pool and just a few more paces over the bridge to town. Great view, great place, great stay!

Cute, well-appointed apartment really close to town but quietly tucked away on the other side of the river. We loved being able to walk downtown (less than 10 min walk) and leave the car behind. There's an amazing bakery (Annie's) just 5 min away, and a foot bridge that takes you the rest of the way to shops and restaurants.
Tyler and Marc were really communicative and responsive; we had some issues with the noise upstairs but they offered a few solutions that worked great and we didn't hear anything after that. The apartment is cozy and clean with views of the mountains and downtown. The little kitchen is great for simple meals and snacks. The king bed was super comfy. The place looks just like the pictures.
We had a great time exploring Glenwood from Tyler's studio apartment and will definitely be back! Thanks for a great stay.

My family had a lovely stay at Tyler’s place. It was very clean, well stocked, comfortable, and the view was gorgeous! There was plenty of space for us and we really enjoyed our stay. The hosts were kind, responsive, and have carefully thought out their space and all the amenities. Whenever we come back out this way, we would definitely choose to stay here again! :)
Great place! Exactly what we were looking for when visiting Glenwood Springs

The unit was very clean and nice, great view and close to most restaurants and activities. The hosts were very friendly and accommodating, they refunded me and helped me re-book in another unit after I had to cancel due to a family emergency. Awesome place and awesome hosts! 10/10 would definitely stay here again!

This studio apartment was charming, modern and has amazing views. The space is just what you need for a perfect getaway in Glenwood Springs. The space itself was clean and bright and had amazing views of the valley from the balcony. You are just one block up from the Hot Springs downtown and within walking distance of the footbridge that takes you to the local restaurants and bars and even the gondola to get to the Adventure Mountain.
The host was repulsive very quickly and addressed any concerns or questions immediately.
We would love to stay here again!
Hosts were helpful and responsive. Beautiful space and very clean.
Always a delight to stay at Tyler’s place….best place to stay in Glenwood Springs!
Clean cute and easy!
The studio was clean and as expected.
Amazing location walking distance from all of downtown. We really enjoyed our stay.
Exactly as described with an amazing view! Walkable to downtown Glenwood Springs. Beautiful and comfortable accommodations. I would recommend to anyone!

Excellent location for getting to everything Glenwood has to offer. Studio was more spacious than we thought it would be with plenty of room, a great balcony overlooking town, and everything we needed right there. Checking in/ out was easy and it was great to have parking right out front. Be prepared for narrow stairs when bringing in bags. Would definitely come back.
The best place to stay in Glenwood Springs hands down! It’s a clean, bright, well appointed space within walking distance to everything.
clean, easy, good communication
Good spot to check out the tight knit feel of Glennwood springs while having a good view, overall me and my friends enjoyed the spot
Amazing place
beautiful stay & even better host. will be returning :)

This place had everything we needed and more. Beautiful view of the town and the mountains in the backdrop. Very private and comfortable space with any amenity that we would've or could've needed. Everything was super clean and the decorations were amazing (lots of mountain photos and artwork that were beautiful). We could easily walk to the restaurants in town, the Glenwood Springs pool, and the Colorado Hotel. Highly recommend staying here and I know we will be back in the future. Thank you so much for this wonderful time!
Amazing space in an equally amazing location. Great view from the balcony, close to the hot springs and downtown. The photos don't do the studio justice, it is very spacious and comfortable.

We loved our stay in Glenwood! This studio is perfectly located for an easy walk to the Hot Springs, and lots of restaurants and shopping. The view is unbeatable and the space itself was tidy and well-kept!! Hope to be back sometime soon!
It was great. Very close to downtown and the hot springs. We were able walked everywhere.

We loved our stay at Tyler’s condo. It was very clean and had everything we needed. The location is perfect and we could walk to many restaurants, shops and the hot springs. We would definitely stay here again!

We LOVED this Airbnb!! Great location, beautiful views and a seamless experience with the host. We felt right at home on our weekend getaway.
Thanks for having us !
Wonderful stay! The host was so helpful and responsive. Great place - lots to do nearby. Amazing skiing nearby
I really enjoyed my stay in Tyty’s place . He was really nice and welcoming. I loved my stay here and will def be back .
This is one of the nicest Airbnb locations I've stayed at. Less than a block from the hot springs and beautiful views.
We loved staying here! The place was beautiful and super clean. It’s walking distance from great restaurants and the hosts were very responsive and kind. Recommend!
Very responsive host, nice clean place close to town. Comfortable beds!
Beautiful cozy stay with an amazing view! Would definitely visit again.
Loved it!!
Highly recommend!
Great place to stay! Nice location walkable to downtown. Having a garage was great considering the snow we got. The place itself is very cozy and welcoming. Recommended!!

Had a wonderful, peaceful, quiet little getaway in this studio equipped with everything you might need for a short stay. The apartment was very cozy and pristine. The hosts were attentive and responsive. Would love to return!

We really enjoyed our stay here. There’s a private patio that’s nice to enjoy the views during the day and night. The condo was also walkable distance to Main Street which was perfect for our trip. The hosts were quick to respond on any questions or concerns we had.
Apartment was very clean and very convenient to get into downtown
Perfect location for walking distance to everywhere
Great condo, excellent location, easy experience
Enjoyed the stay
We loved Glenwood this spot was magical! Thank you!
Great place to stay that is close to all the awesome places to explore.
It was a cozy house on a quiet hillside. It was nice to be able to put a car in a private car garage.

Cutest Airbnb filled with so much love. Clean and tidy when walked in. Immediately felt home. My kids loved the home and called it “happy home”. Host Sara was available and quick to respond. Can’t thank them enough.
What a lovely studio apartment! It was exactly as described. Super clean, wonderful views, and easy to walk to restaurants. It is a five minute drive to Iron Mountain Hot Springs. We loved our stay.

Tyler’s property was one of the cleanest properties I’ve been in. Very tastefully decorated, modern and with beautiful views! Walking distance to all the restaurants, shops and the pool. Comfortable bed. Very responsive host and flexible with my check in which helped me tremendously. Will definitely stay here again when in the area!

What a wonderful place to stay if you're looking for a weekend getaway. The host was very helpful, communicated well, and made sure that we were welcomed. The location was very clean, close to all points of interest in Glenwood, and private. I would return.
We loved our stay here in Glenwood and Sara and Tyler have a killer property with the most amazing view of town. We couldn’t have asked for a better place to spend a few days!
Totally worth it
Had a great time staying here. Cozy, easy to find and close to everything.

We enjoyed our stay. The room was perfect for the two of us. The only set back was that the walking noise was louder than anticipated from the upstairs occupants. Other than that everything was great.
Beautiful views!! It was very clean, and comfortable. Thankyou :)

Loved this place, the decor, the location and the sun coming in on the bed in the morning if curtains open! I would love to stay here again!
It was perfect and great to have covered parking.
Great hosts and quick communication.
Thank you!!
We had such an amazing stay. Location was wonderful, views were fabulous and the hospitality was great. Highly recommend a stay!
Fantastic place! Clean and organized, and easy walking distance to shops and restaurants. The hosts were great communicators. Highly recommend!

This is a hidden gem in GS! Amazing location, right next to the hot springs pool and walkable to downtown. It’s such a cute studio, perfectly comfy and takes advantage of the space with the layout. Has everything you would need!
Very cozy! Sara the cohost was very communicative and responsive. Very nice for our mother daughter weekend getaway.

Thank you for our wonderful stay!
We had a great time. The space was very comfortable!
Excellent stay! Very clean, perfect location, well decorated, super comfortable beds, and had everything we needed! I definitely recommend!
This place is cozy and comfortable. Easy to find and had everything we wanted/needed. The bathroom was pristine and the basics in the kitchen. We’d definitely stay again.
We had a great stay here! If we are ever in town again I would absolutely stay here again!
We had a great stay! It was convenient to many places. We were able to walk to breakfast, shops, dinner and ice cream. Nice location for the little town and for visiting other towns.
Great location and lovely decor, clean and comfortable. Highly recommend!

Wonderful stay in the heart of Glenwood Springs The space itself is clean, spacious, and incredibly comfortable. Has everything one would need in a stay away from home. The washer and dryer is shared with one other unit, but was no problem having access and availability to. Just up the street from the CO Hotel, the Airbnb looks down upon the city and is an easy 10 minute walk to downtown GS. Loved my stay here and would recommend anyone visiting the GS area to check it out themselves.

If you’re looking for a convenient location, close to historic old town, you can’t do much better than this!
It’s good for one or two travellers. Three would feel a little tight. The bathroom is small but the main room is airy and bright.
Very comfortable bed!
The stairs to get to the unit are steep so be aware that getting heavy luggage up and down will take some effort. I couldn’t have done it on my own.
There is definitely noise from the other units so if you are looking for a feeling of seclusion and privacy, or are bothered by noises, this might not be the place for you.
We only stayed one night so we did t explore the town but there is no shortage of great options close by!
Hosts were excellent with communication!
Such a beautiful place in a great location! Easy to walk to hot springs, entertainment, and lots of restaurants! The place was absolutely beautiful! Will definitely be back!

The location is excellent - under a 10 minute walk to downtown/restaurants and Glenwood hot springs. Loved the privacy of the location as well. The studio was clean and had all the necessities. The host was very responsive and accommodating! Would absolutely stay here again.
Great place to stay if you’re in the Glenwood area. Love the place and the washer / dryer is a game changer!
Great stay!!!!

Perfect base camp for a few days in Glenwood Springs! The studio was clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed. It was also nice to be within walking distance of pretty much everything in town. We loved sitting on the balcony taking in the beautiful views of the mountains. Sara was an excellent host and always answered messages promptly if we had questions. Would highly recommend!
Beautiful scenery & home. Would recommend coming back.

Exactly as pictured, sparkling clean, had everything I needed, responsive communication, local recommendations and right next to the hot springs.
2 min walk to Glenwood Hot Springs, 5 min walk to Yampa Vapor Caves and 5 min drive to Iron Mountain Hot Springs.
Added to my favorites, would definitely stay again.

Our family of 4 really enjoyed our stay at this beautiful condo! The views are amazing, location is prime, less than 5 min walk to the hot springs :) Host/co-cost are quick to respond and very attentive to our needs. We’ll def be back!

Tyler was an amazing host and saved our Labor Day weekend. He and Sara went above and beyond in preparing the house for an early check-in and even had a bottle of wine ready for us! At the time of check-out we looked around all the binders but could not find any to-dos for the checkout process except to make sure the property is securely locked. What an amazing white glove service.
The location is pretty good too with amazing views, and peaceful privacy while everything within walking distance. The property is ideal for winters too with its attached garage. The Glenwood Hot Springs pool is literally just steps away. We definitely plan on returning sometime in the future and highly recommend it to other travelers as well.

We enjoyed our stay here!
The location was great. The place was very clean, and the town area is within walking distance. The host was excellent with communicating and answering any questions!
The only reason why I could not give it five stars was because there was a misunderstanding with the cleaning crew and entered our unit just after 8am while we were still laying in bed, the day that we had to check out.
The host was very apologetic and handled the situation professionally.
Overall, I would highly recommend and stay here again!

Tyler's place is clean, classy, and cozy. He and Sara do a great job taking care of their guests!
Nice walkable location to local restaurants and shops, as well. Definitely recommend to stay there when in Glenwood.
Perfect spot for exploring Glenwood Springs area! Beautiful, unobstructed views of the mountains, and located on a quiet, private street. Will definitely stay here again when I’m back!
Amazing stay, will be booking again next time we come to Glenwood.

super nice place, very clean! nice balcony and amenities are great for a shorter stay. kind hosts and any necessities were available easily. great neighborhood, the garage was a huge plus. overall a great experience.
Fantastic central spot in Glenwood Springs with amazing views. It’s a short walk to hot springs and restaurants. Responsive and kind hosts.

Awesome place! I enjoyed its close proximity from Hotel Colorado and the Glenwood Hot springs pool.
I used this Airbnb last year and came back because it was clean, had a garage parking and provides a comfortable atmosphere. The host is also very responsive. Lastly, it has awesome views!
I would absolutely comeback and stay here again.
Super fun place to stay, close to great food and shops. Would enjoy coming back.
My wife and I had an awesome stay for our anniversary!! Totally recommend this place to anyone trying to have a little get away.

This place was absolutely perfect for our carless adventure into Glenwood Springs. Walkable from the train station, right across from the hot springs pools, super close to downtown yet a quiet and peaceful place overlooking the valley. Lovely, pristine accommodations. Great spot.

Tylers place was in a perfect location, near all the things with a fantastic view. The space has a great bed, great bathroom and towels and even has a garage space to safely park the car! We loved our stay :)

The moment we stepped inside this adorable place we felt at home. It is beautifully furnished, clean, clutter-free, and had everything we needed. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook breakfast and dinner. The sheets were crisp, the towels looked and felt new, the pillows perfect, and the fold-out sofa had a magnificent new foam mattress. We loved the shower, and the amenities. Many Airbnbs do not supply this level of (nice-smelling) shampoo, conditioner, and body wash.
The view from the studio was a delight. In particular, we enjoyed sitting on the balcony and watching the afternoon lightning and rain 'show'. The place was very quiet and it felt safe and cozy. The garage was a plus too. I can't say enough good stuff about this place. It was perfect!
Lovely little studio! Very comfy! Super accommodating host.
Highly recommend!
Very beautiful home with complimentary wine which was perfect for my mom after such a long drive! Easy check in and perfect location with gorgeous balcony view :)
Great view from balcony! Super clean and was easy to communicate with
Beautiful flat with equally wonderful views. Extremely clean and bright inside, easy to settle in for the night with provided amenities or walk downtown to enjoy the local offerings.

This was our first time booking a place on Airbnb, and we could not have been happier! Communication with Sara was terrific — we were able to check in a little bit early, and she remained in contact throughout our 2-night stay. The studio was spotlessly clean and included everything we could have needed, including a binder full of suggestions for things to do, see, and eat. The “welcome” bottle of wine was an especially nice touch! The view is gorgeous, and the king size bed was super comfortable, with the coziest bedding. This is easily the nicest place we’ve stayed in Glenwood Springs (this was our third visit here), and we hope to stay here again on our future trips. We cannot recommend Tyler and Sara’s place highly enough!
Great location with beautiful views! We loved how easy it was to walk to town. Keyless entry was very convenient and the place was homey! We loved our stay!
Great spot and very peaceful
Great little place within walking distance of pretty much everything in glenwood!
A very comfortable stay in a very walkable location. Appreciated the notebook of suggestions. AC and garage were so nice. Keurig / Nespresso would be nice to have.
We enjoyed our stay here. Place was clean, comfortable and close to many points of interest.
Had a lovely visit. Great views of the town. Easily walkable to downtown and the hot springs. Would definitely stay again.
We really enjoyed our 2 night stay. The place appeared newly renovated and was absolutely spotless. Bed was quite comfortable. The view was my favorite part!
Great stay! Very close walk to the hot springs. Enjoyed a bottle of wine from the hosts! Highly recommend!

Wonderful stay in Glenwood Springs! Location can’t be beat! Gorgeous view, super clean, comfy bed, balcony and garage to park in were a welcomed xtra. Felt very safe and immediately at home. Host was very nice!

Here are the highlights of my stay:
First and foremost, the location is absolutely amazing. It's conveniently situated within walking distance of various restaurants and hot springs. Being able to explore the local dining scene and indulge in relaxing hot springs without the hassle of transportation was a huge plus for me. The proximity to these attractions made my stay both convenient and enjoyable.
Now, let's talk about the view. It was truly breathtaking.
One thing that pleasantly surprised me was that this place exceeded my expectations. In most cases, Airbnb listings tend to use heavily edited or exaggerated photos, but this was not the case here. The photos simply didn't do justice to the actual beauty and charm of the place. I was delighted to find that it was even better in person. The attention to detail and the thought put into every aspect of the accommodation made me feel like I was staying in a true home away from home.
Tyler’s place was exactly as pictured—amazing views, and the inside is beautiful! We even had a chilled bottle of wine in our fridge waiting for us. We wish we could stay longer!

Awesome location, super clean, and private with excellent views. The mud room / closet space was a nice bonus to stay organized during our stay, and the outdoor space, huge windows, ceiling fan, and king sized bed really topped off the experience. Highly recommend!

We cannot gush more about this gem! We picked 4 spots on our Colorado tour, and this was our second destination. The host was communicative and friendly. We were greeted by a beautiful bottle of white wine and the place was immaculate and perfect for what our family needed. We also loved how the studio was decorated with Colorado scenery. We spent two, fun-filled days soaking in hot springs, eating at local restaurants and enjoying the cool vibe that is Glenwood Springs. We will certainly be back and would definitely be tempted to stay at this Airbnb the second time around!

A modern and cozy apartment with amazing views, just a few minutes walk from downtown Glenwood Springs! The apartment included plenty of local recommendations, and Sara was also flexible, offering us an early check-in. Would highly recommend this place!
Amazing!
Clean place. Perfect location. Walkable to everything. Tons to do

This is our favorite place to stay in Glenwood Springs! Great quiet location with amazing views. This location is just a short walk from the hot springs and tons of great restaurants. We are looking forward to staying here again.

Tyler and Sara’s place met all of our expectations! The location was perfect and it was easy to find. The stairs to the apartment are incredibly steep, so watch for that. 10/10 experience and will definitely be back! Highly recommend.

One of the best airbnbs I’ve stayed in. The view is priceless. Location is top notch. The hosts, especially Sara, was kind and responsive. I left a sentimental item at the Airbnb & she was able to assist me in returning it right away. They have a whole binder of local recommendations and activities. The room is clean & updated. Can’t rave enough about this stay, will be back!!
The space and location were absolutely perfect with an incredible view to top it all off. Thank you for a perfect weekend away!
No surprises. Comfy, clean, and a great launch pad for all of our adventures in the area.
This room was exactly as described. It was clean and beautiful. The bathroom was great! Host was helpful and responded quickly. Will stay here again in the future!
The location was really nice, with everything in walking distance. The air BNB was clean and quite/private.
A beautiful little place that's a perfect home base for visiting Glenwood springs

Had a wonderful stay at this property. The location was clean and beautiful with an amazing view, which is exactly what I was hoping for and promised on the profile. The owner and the property manager were wonderful and attentive. Couldn’t have asked for a better escape.
Left the location feeling sad having to leave. Beautiful studio! Great view, we were able to walk everywhere we needed to go.
Overall we were very impressed and would definitely come again. We loved the great view and walkability of this stay.

We loved the location a
D ability to walk across the bridge to the town with great restaurants and shops.
it was so perfect that i booked my next stay before even checking out. we loved everything about it! so gorgeous and clean, too! can't wait to go back!

The studio apartment isn’t quite what we were expecting, but it suited us just fine. This is a 3 story townhome that’s been split into an airbnb and a permanent residence. The bottom floor is a two car garage shared with the resident that lives on the third floor. We were on the second floor and could hear every footstep and voice above us.
Thinking it was an entire studio apartment, I incorrectly assumed it would have a stove top/oven. It does have a full sized fridge, plug-in hot plate, and everything we needed to make a simple breakfast.
The highlights: super clean, SUPER comfortable king bed, ease of parking, and 10 minute walk downtown.
Perfect, super fun location, the place was super clean and well decorated. The hosts were amazing, very communicative and helpful. Would recommend!
Great place, incredibly clean, responsive and nice host. Easily walkable to downtown and the hot springs, great view from the balcony and very cozy location!
Looking forward to our next stay at Tyler’s studio— everything we could have wanted for our time in Glenwood Springs.
Very clean and very close to everything that we wanted to walk to, such a great place.

The space was really inviting and cozy and the view from the balcony was beautiful. The bed was also super comfortable.
Being the lower unit though you do hear people above you and can hear them going up the stairs etc.
This place was in the perfect location. Everything was 10-15 minutes walking distance. The place was clean and the view from the patio was great. Will be coming to this spot again.
Stayed here previously with a friend and was very glad to make a return visit. We always check Tyler's place first when we're traveling through Glenwood. Comfortable space and seamless process.
Such a cute place and great location with amazing views! Highly recommend!
Great stay , place was cozy and a quick walk to everything. The views were amazing as well. Would stay here again.

Wonderful condo walking distance from a number of fun things to do between the hot springs, breweries, and everything else in Glenwood. Highly recommend this to anyone dropping by. Host is stellar and knows how to run a solid Airbnb.

The location and view from Tyler’s place was well worth every penny. We were very comfortable and had virtually everything we needed. Wi-Fi is not the greatest, but Tyler reached out and was able to provide a quick solution. Only real negative was the noise from upstairs; pretty consistently happened early each morning (not the fault of the people upstairs; more likely due to poor/old construction). Being able to walk across the pedestrian bridge to restaurants was a bonus! Host was extremely responsive and made the stay comfortable and enjoyable.
Perfect spot for a nice weekend in Glennwood Springs. Beautiful view
Great place for my family of 3. It was very clean and cozy. Close to hot springs and restaurants! Would definitely come again!

We had a little miscommunication I thought I booked two days apparently only booked one. I got a phone call saying the cleaning people were there we were there within 10 to 15 minutes. We got our stuff out as fast as we could so that Cleaning People can get their job done definite oversight on myself.
Would definitely stay there again great location close all the amenities that we were doing the Hot Springs and restaurants

This place was exactly as pictured and described. Super clean and nice, the garage was great especially with the snow. Really nice bed and games in the room, tv was super slow one day but worked great the next day. Very easy check in and check out!
wonderful space. everything we needed, even in a small studio space. walkable to downtown and nice views.
Amazing location and beautiful space! We loved staying at this Airbnb. Everything was clean and comfortable. Host is very responsive and kind. Would recommend this Airbnb to anyone!

This place was fantastic! Location was perfect for our visit to the hot springs and eateries downtown. The space was well thought out, super clean and comfortable. I was pleasantly surprised that we could park in the garage and also by the little surprise gift. I sure hope I have an opportunity to come back!!

What a wonderful place! Beautiful views of the mountains, easily walkable to the hot springs. Great location, 30 min from Sunlight and under an hour to Aspen-Snowmass. The space was super clean and we hope to stay again soon!
The place is as advertised. It’s clean, comfortable, and in a great location

Great place to stay in glenwood! We have stayed at a number of airbnbs here and will definitely be returning to this one! Easy walk over the bridge to downtown restaurants. Space is large and clean. King bed was great, as are views!

Loved this cute little Airbnb. PERFECT for a couple getaway. Everything was clean and super accessible. The bed was amazing to sleep on. Very close to shops and activities. LOVED THE iron hot springs there and the slopes at sunlight mountain were great.
If we ever come back, will be staying here!!
Also the best views!!

Such an adorable little space for the weekend !
Very spacious and clean, and perfectly within walking distance for anything we were wanting to do !
We had a great time at this studio! It was in the perfect location to explore Glenwood Springs. The perfect spot!
I had to cancel this reservation before arriving but everyone was very helpful and understanding

The place was clean and conveniently close to everything in town. The pillow and bed sheets were very comfortable! It made sleeping much easier. I love how everything was modern. It was very spacious. I recommend.
The perfect experience.....well worth the cost. I 100% recommend staying at this location.

My friend and I made a spontaneous trip here we booked the day before and once we got there we were blown away by the views. An absolutely beautiful home with fast responses from the owners, Sara and Tyler were amazing and helped us with everything we needed and gave clear instructions. If I am ever in Colorado again I will 100% be back!
Great stay!

Tyler and Sara were very accommodating, and the apartment was clean, and comfortable. The location is perfect, just a short walk to the hot springs and downtown. Absolute great stay for a weekend getaway.
Awesome place to stay at
Perfect!
Like all of the other reviews, this space was a great location and hosts were very responsive.
Great spot with beautiful views!
We had a great stay! The mountain view from the balcony is gorgeous. Everything was clean and as described. Response host. Would definitely stay again!

Can’t say enough good things about the service we had from Tyler and Sara. They were super flexible with the check in and check out. Also we’re very responsive with communication. The recommendations for things to do and places to eat were very much appreciated.
The location had a great view and was very clean and nice. Would 100% recommend to anyone looking for a great spot to stay at when visiting Glenwood Springs.
Needed a last minute place and was able to stay here with no issues. The place was very clean and cozy, it felt like a small home! Would definitely stay here again.
Great place to stay! Loved it!
Very clean and great location! Host was very responsive- made check in and checkout a breeze!
Great spot, super cute and close to downtown!

Great location and responsive host. We always love a spot that is walking distance from fun things to do and delicious places to eat, this was that spot. We visited mainly for the hot springs and this was an easy place to set up for the evening. The host was responsive and helpful with whatever we needed. The instructions and details were clear and concise.

This condo is amazing! Right in the heart of Glenwood. Less than 5 minute drive to iron mountain hot springs (highly recommend) Great location, easy to find, and absolutely beautiful views from the balcony! The condo was clean and looked just like the pictures. Was tricky finding the hidden ceiling fan button behind the curtains, got a little warm at night despite trying to turn down air. Other than that, it was a great stay. Sara was extremely friendly and responded right away with anything we needed! Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a peaceful weekend in Glenwood. Can’t wait to come back!
Perfect spot for a 1-2 person getaway
Great stay. Would come back again

We had such an amazing stay in Glenwood Springs. Sara was easy to communicate with and the space was cozy and relaxing. We were close enough to walk to many places as well. Highly recommend staying here!
Great location, beautiful view, super cozy!
Everything was great, excellent communication, convenient location and beautiful/clean space.
Really enjoyed. The views skerries great and easy access to town and the hot springs.

We loved the studio space! The bed was super comfortable and you cannot beat the view! The kitchenette was perfect for reheating leftovers. We loved that the studio was walking distance to downtown and were able to walk over for breakfast, dinner, and to the hot springs! Would definitely book this space again!
Best place to stay in Glenwood Springs! Walking distance to everything, clean and comfortable with garage parking.
Most definitely will love to come back again! :)

My husband and I loved our stay in Glenwood Springs. The location was excellent as it is only a 10 minute walk to most restaurants and stores. The view from the room is an added bonus and it was perfect for a long weekend stay. We would definitely come back! Sara was an excellent host and responded very quickly to any questions.
This studio is tucked away in a secluded corner of Glenwood Springs. If you don’t mind and are capable of carrying luggage up a staircase, this place is a wonderful location.
Great studio with plenty of room! Close to the hot springs, and the bridge to go downtown. Love the views and location, had everything we needed!
This apartment was just perfect for our honeymoon. We loved how close it was to everything. It was so relaxing and wonderful.

The place was clean and in a great location! We appreciated the garage and being able to walk to eat, shop, and soak in the Hot Springs pool. The hosts were very responsive to any questions or issues we had. Great choice over a hotel with the added amenities and space.

The unit was exactly as presented. Incredibly clean and a fantastic location. The communication was amazing! We had no problem finding the unit and gaining entry. A welcoming bottle of white wine w as such a nice touch. Highly recommend.
Clean, nice place!
We really enjoyed our stay at this property! It was very clean and in a great location. Communication was fast and easy. Would highly recommend and stay again when in Glenwood Springs.
Awesome condo with great views. Quick walk to the hot springs!
Beautiful studio with the most amazing view of the mountains. We would definitely recommend this place. The host was so nice, flexible and thoughtful. Very happy with our stay !

A very clean and newly renovated studio. Has good location and great view. just a note for light sleepers, we did hear walking and steps from upstairs unit at 1115 pm and again at 615 am. Would recommendiron mountain hot springs for am appt was wonderful!
Tyler’s place is great. Easy access from the highway, very clean and up-to-date. Directions and instructions were spot-on.
The unit was very comfortable, as described, and great location. Communication was excellent and response time to questions very prompt. Thank you!
Great location and loved the space!
Great little place, we’ll be back!
Loved this cozy stay in Glenwood Springs! It was the perfect location and had everything we needed! Will definitely be back!!
Great spot! Great location!

Tyler's place was sparkling clean and beautifully decorated. Comfortable bed, great shower, well-equipped kitchen, large deck with beautiful view. Easy walking to the hot spring, dining, and shopping. Highly recommend.

One of my favorite places I have stayed. The room is a great alternative to a traditional hotel room while offering a bit more space as well as kitchen functionality. The upgrades to the house were nicely done. The shower is amazing! Love the nice darkening shades and the overall open space.
We had such an amazing experience. You cannot beat this view!
Tyler's studio was in a great location to walk to downtown and very comfortable! Highly recommended

Beautiful view. We had everything we needed. Very convenient to downtown and the Glenwood Canyon bike trail. Sara was great and responded right away. We were a bit at the mercy of the person above us who started their day very early, but otherwise, a perfect getaway!

Fantastic stay! This studio is huge, with great spaces to hang out, work, and rest. I loved working and being able to take in the views through the huge windows. And to echo the other reviews - the bed is so comfortable (which is an understatement). This spot is so close to things to do, has the basic necessities of a kitchenette including appliances, and is peaceful. Also probably the cleanest garage ever. The hosts are super responsive and also had great suggestions and help.

Such a cute and cozy and comfortable place to stay. The view from the balcony is breathtaking and we loved that the downtown Glenwood area was within walking distance. Amenities were exactly what you would need, including laundry and the garage space, which was a nice bonus. Great communication from Sara, our host. We will definitely be staying here the next time we make our way to Glenwood Springs!
Adorable Airbnb with a gorgeous view, I would highly recommend!
Great location! Walkable to every where. Enjoyed the views as well. Very clean
We really enjoyed our stay here, wish it could’ve been longer! Great location, cozy and comfortable with a beautiful balcony to enjoy the trees overlooking historic Glennwood. Recommend!
Great place to stay if you want walking distance to downtown, the hot springs, iron springs and adventure park.

Nice area next to a beautiful creek. Breakfast was very good.
We LOVED sleeping with the windows open & listening to the river. Breakfast was excellent! Jim & Sharill are very friendly.

Stayed 1 night during a cross country road trip. Jim was a great host. He welcomed me on my arrival and quickly gave me a tour before allowing me to relax after a long drive.
Breakfast was prepared and in the fridge which I REALLY appreciated since I was leaving so early in the morning.
Beautiful scenery and walking trails included!
Thanks Jim!
Jim and his wife are a very nice couple. The surroundings are beautiful and the cabin is right next to the creek.
Adorable cabin, less than 10 minute drive from Sunlight mountain resort. Great communication with host and delicious breakfast of quiche, orange juice, yogurt, and scones. Yum!
Very sweet couple, they made sure we were taking care of and their cooking is phenomenal! I’ll definitely be back! :)
Great friendly hosts!
Jim and his wife were amazing and guided us through the cabin and made us feel like family. I loved this place and so did my girlfriend and our two golden retrievers
Such a cozy place. Jim and his wife are lovely. We really enjoyed our stay!
Jim and Sharill are amazing hosts. We can’t wait to come back again and again
Hosts were amazing. Very nice people and had butter for us since we forgot some at the store. Amazing place!
Wonderful hosts and delicious breakfast! Location can’t be beat - quiet and serene at the cabin with easy access to Carbondale.

Jim's place was perfect for our family get away. Jim went above and beyond setting up our cabin- he pulled the futon out and even put a mattress on it so it would be comfortable and ready for our boys. We didn't arrive until around 9:00 PM, but Jim met us at our cabin and showed us around to ensure we felt comfortable. The grounds were expansive and a lot of fun for our boys to explore. Jim and Sharill gave us a tour of their other buildings and some great history of the area and artifacts in their home. Breakfast was a bonus!!! Each afternoon we were brought our breakfast to enjoy the next morning at our leisure. We enjoyed quiche, scones, yogurt and orange juice. Whenever we needed anything, like more papertowels/TP/towels, Jim was quick to bring it over to us. We feel lucky we found this place and will definitely be staying at the property again!

We came here to have a nice little getaway for my best friend’s birthday…. Jim and Sheryl were so kind and accommodating! The little b&b was so perfect and cozy. Definitely check out the house for lots of interesting memorabilia!
Amazing getaway for us and our dog! Beautiful place, extremely friendly host, and unmatched hospitality. If we visit Glenwood Springs again, we will definitely be coming back. Highly recommend!

Jim's place was exactly what we were hoping for. you can see the care and effort put into every item in the space. the location is perfect, just outside of town but felt secluded. the teepee and creek just add to the peaceful vibe. the rebuilt barn/performance space was intriguing and I would love to come back and see some music there. Jim himself is a great musician and he is super friendly and helpful. love this place we will be back.
Thank you.
Jim’s place was perfect. Nice, quiet, comfortable, and the homemade breakfast we got to enjoy privately in the cabin was delicious. We will definitely be back!
Jim.was very friendly and the B&B was a perfect getaway. Delicious breakfast too!

Overall, the stay wasn't exactly what we were expecting or had in mind for our family of four due to the condition of the cabin and with the difficulty of trying to cook anything with very limited materials. The couple was sweet enough to try to accommodate an allergy. However, we didn't realize it wasn't a traditional bed in breakfast where a variety of options might be offered such as a hot meal each morning, fresh coffee and/or teas, etc. For families that prefer to cook light, even on vacation, it would be helpful to have more silverware, actual cutting knives, clean cutting boards, a whole roll of paper towels from the start, more kitchen linens available, soap at the kitchen sink for washing your hands, a larger trash can, etc. Outside of the cabin was nice in that our kids could explore independently and have fun. Despite our experience, Jim and Sharill were very kind, welcoming, & shared an interest in what we had planned during our trip. We appreciate that!

Jim was a great host from the moment we booked. Very welcoming when we arrived. Walked us through the property and made us feel very welcome.
Thank you
Cute stay in the nature. Responsive host.

Jim was wonderful. He came right out to greet us, show us around and give us recommendations for places in town. The place was comfortable, cozy and exactly as described. I wish we would’ve had more time here!

Jim and Sharill were great host to us. They were very friendly and nice. I visited with my friends and we loved the sweet cozy cabin filled with colorful vintage furnitures. They even had a Tepee at the creekside and a Barn converted to a beautiful concert hall. Love the overall stay and the vibe. Our winter fantasy came true!! Much love to this sweet couple.
Cute rustic cabin with very friendly and welcoming hosts!

What a wonderful cabin getaway near Glenwood. A true bed and breakfast experience on beautiful property. We fell asleep to the sounds of the babbling brook and woke up and had a delicious meal. Jim and his wife were wonderful hosts, and made us feel very welcome in their world of art and music. This will be our must-stay spot whenever we are back at the hot springs! The photos do not do it justice!
Highly responsive and caring.... We had a check in situation with a last minute scheduling conflict that came up and he was quick to check in and make sure everything was okay and easy to work with.

We loved Jim’s place very much. Jim is a wonderful host and was super helpful in assisting us on what to explore around ! It takes you back to another time ! If you are looking for a rustic old cabin experience - this is the place for you. Easy access to Glenwood, Aspen.
Jim was flexible with friends who were going with me and their needs. We even offered to pay more for accomodating our changes and he declined. Served everyone well
Beautiful property and friendly hosts! It felt like coming home, even on my first visit
We loved our stay and we’ll definitely be back!
I wish I could’ve stayed here for a few more nights—a serene hand-crafted environment and the coziest cabin. Pure hospitality. Amazing property. Great humans.

Jim and Sharill's bed and breakfast is an absolute gem! The uniqueness of the place is immediately apparent, with captivating artwork embellishing the spaces and a delightful music venue adding a special touch. The breakfast quiche and cookies are not just delicious but also leave you craving for the recipes to recreate at home. The trails through the woods offer a serene escape, complimented by the soothing sounds of the creek that add a symphony to the atmosphere. The beautiful cabin provides a cozy retreat, and the fantastic water pressure adds a touch of luxury. Jim and Sharill have created a haven that blends art, music, nature, and comfort seamlessly. Highly recommend for a memorable getaway!
Jim and his wife were superhosts. They are so warm and welcoming. Their cabins are the perfect place for relaxation and pecefulness.
It’s rare to find a true bed-and-breakfast on Airbnb, but that’s what Jim’s place is! Terrific accommodations, beautiful property, and delicious food. Can’t recommend highly enough!

This was a gem of a find. The prettiest scenery, cute cabin, fun buildings to explore, beautiful creek running behind the cabin that you could hear all the time, and a delicious breakfast. Jim and his wife were amazing hosts. Will definitely be back.
Nice folks and nice property. We will be staying here next time we're in Glenwood

We just needed a place to stay while we attended a festival. We had no idea that we would be staying in a well kept museum that had so many interesting aspects about it.
The hosts were friendly and accommodating, and their property was adjacent to a beautiful stream!

What a lovely place! Jim and Sharill are fantastic hosts, and you can see and feel the love they put into their place. Fall asleep listening to the creek right outside your window, enjoy a cup of coffee or wine in a peaceful setting, and enjoy the lovely breakfast delivered to your cabin. Thanks so much! We had a relaxing time!
Great place to unwind from busy places.
Jim was a nice and accommodating host.

What a slice of heaven that Jim and Cheryl have. They have been there 25 years and beautifully restored the barn and cabins. Scenic setting beneath tall trees set beside 4 Mile Creek just a few miles outside of Glenwood. Even had breakfast (rare with Airbnb hosts) ready to go in our fridge with great outdoor seating spots adjacent to the creek. Make sure you carve out some time to just hang out on the property. Highly recommended.

Our stay was absolutely magical! Escaping a heatwave of 100+ degree temps in Houston to stay in a mountain cabin at 65 degrees, who could ask for more? This place has so much, it’s the ultimate place to relax. Our cabin was next to a small stream, so nice to hear the sound of it as you go to sleep. Lots of things to look at on the property including a large barn with a stage, old fire trucks, a bridge over the creek to a large pasture with a teepee, a small cowboy cabin/mini museum, antiques and more! I also recommend reading the two books Mr. Hawkins wrote and listening to his music. Thanks to “Hawk” and his lovely wife for a great stay!

Jim and Cheryl’s place was beautiful! Lots to explore and plenty of places to enjoy the peace and quiet of the Colorado mountains. The best part was the “magic fridge” (named by my kids) that replenished itself every morning with a yummy homemade breakfast. Highly recommend!
Nice private place with outside walking area on a few acres with stream

Amazing property, so peaceful! We had a great time walking around the property and exploring all the collectibles on display. Jim and his wife are friendly and accommodating. The fresh made breakfast was delicious. Especially enjoyed being able to eat it riverside. The cabin is very cute and nicely decorated. Recommend the stay!

Four Mile B&B is rustic, charming and a little bit of heaven. We stayed in the cabin by the creek and WOW what a wonderful experience. We could hear the creek running. It was so calming. Jim and Sharill are great hosts. They showed us around and Jim told us some wonderful wildlife stories plus he treated us to a few songs. He is a great musician. You must check out Sharill’s jewelry. She is quite the artist. One last thing the breakfast was delicious!!!
Cute and comfy cabin complete with the sounds of the stream flowing by outside the window. I slept great! Friendly hosts. Make sure to check out their music venue in the barn loft!
Jim and his wife are great people. The provided breakfast was great and it is a beautiful property.
Can’t beat the location!
Thank you so much for the wonderful stay at your place. The breakfast was so delicious. Hospitality was the best! We will definitely stay with you again. Thanks!

I desperately needed a retreat-I had planned on a day at the hot springs and did not want to drive home. I booked Jim's place and as I drove out of town into the mountains, my whole body rejoiced! It is also located on Four Mile which has multiple meaning for me.
The property is amazing- I booked it because of the cabin being near a creek..it was so much more. I am going to book again for September.
Elizabeth R
Jim and Sharill were incredibly kind and easy to work with! The cabin was cozy and the grounds were super fun to explore! Awesome B&B experience
The place was tranquil and the welcome was warm. Jim and Sherril were lovely hosts and went out of their way to make us feel at home. The homemade breakfast was delicious too!!

Jim and his wife are delightful hosts. We found we had our love of music and guitar-playing in common and spent some time sharing songs and stories! Lovely, unique, hand-made-by-his-wife earrings were available for purchase. The surroundings are everything you’d want for a relaxing and interesting stay — creekside seating and a fascinating old bunkhouse filled with intriguing articles of the Old West are highlights. Jim’s books of stories from his years as a firefighter and lyrics of songs he’s written were great reads. A 20-minute drive gets you to downtown Glenwood Springs. Definitely recommend Four Mile Creek B & B!
Beautiful property! Very unique! Hosts are super friendly!
It was a little place of Eden. Truly beautiful and a wonderful find. We will be visiting again.

Amazing cabin literally ON THE RIVER. Cozy, great bed, plenty of basic kitchen supplies.
Jim and his wife are such wonderful hosts. They are available for touring the property, answering questions and guiding you on back road choices. We are so glad we found Jim’s spot. It is a true treasure.
Nice private place to stay next to a creek. breakfast was very nice as well. will definitely stay again if we are in the area!

the divine is in the details. we explored every inch of this oasis of a property. Hosts felt just like comfy friends. so much history, so much obvious laughter and love has gone into this place. We are already planning a return visit. Jim and Sharril went way above and beyond to make our visit a remarkable memory. Thanks Hawkins! see ya soon. You are much appreciated. LynnT and sis Loanne.
A hidden gem!

We loved staying in this beautiful spot. It was cozy and tucked away while still being 10 minutes from all that Glenwood has to offer. They also provided a yummy breakfast. This place had so much character and charm!

The creekside cabin was perfect for us - we had everything we needed and it was super cozy. We loved sitting in the evening with the windows open listening to the creek outside. But even better was exploring the property that Jim and Sharill have lovingly appointed - from a green lawn across the bridge with a stage and tons of seating areas, to the new sculpture garden among the aspens, and last (but not least!) the amazing barn converted into a live music venue.

The space was adorable but could use a little updating. The mattress was not the most comfortable mattress in the world but decent.
The location was unbeatable. You listen to the creek all night and have an incredible view of the stars. Lots of great history with the location as well. Breakfast was delicious and a lovely touch. Would stay again!

Absolutely beautiful spot, and warm and charming cabin, with wonderful hosts. Jim and Sharill’s art and creativity suffuse the property. Thank you for allowing on-leash dogs; we love having comfortable places to stay while traveling with the dogs.
Beautiful place to stay, both the cabin and the grounds. Extremely welcoming with some breakfast in the fridge for the next day. Jim was very nice and helpful. Whole stay was incredibly relaxing.
Jim and Sharill were kind and friendly hosts. They have a lovely guesthouse. It was warm when it was very cold outside. The barn is a must see experience. And, the breakfast was delicious.
Fabulous stay. Jim and Sharill were charming hosts, as was there place. We wish could have stayed longer.

Jim's place is fantastic! We loved staying there and would love to come back in the summer and for the summer musical series. The location is excellent - close to great backcountry and downhill skiing.

We could not say enough positive about Jim and his wife and their lovely bed and breakfast! It is so peaceful and cozy and perfect for our three day getaway into the mountains! They are great hosts and spent time with us sharing the story of how they transformed this homestead into the beautiful bed and breakfast they have now. The breakfast each day was delicious and filling. Take time to explore the barn. I would love to come back in the summer when they host the local musicians.

Five miles up a winding road near Glenwood Springs, CO sits a pastoral idyll called Four Mile Creek Bed and Breakfast featuring timeless amenities ranging from repurposed barn beams and radiant floor heating to classic furnishings amidst fresh linens and other eye-catching comforts and adornments. Like the 3 creekside guest cabins, the 1885 main house is charming and comfortable with a careful collection of remarkable antiquities from an era gone by. In fact, the entire scene breathes with a classic Colorado country charm not often found in more modern accommodations. We awoke from our peaceful slumber to a bright Western Slope sun glinting off the snow and silence (save the creek) our only companion. With a tip of the ten gallon, we left with Jim and Sharill's warm invitation to revisit this little canyon paradise a stone's throw from the Roaring Fork. 'til next time, then...

Beautiful location! Perfectly quaint and the owners were very nice.
I want to come back to enjoy the scenery, as opposed to using it as a one night crash pad for Snowmass

Jim’s cabin was absolutely cozy and beautiful. There is a creek that winds around the cabin and it’s so quiet you can hear it gurgling. The barn has a performance space that seems like an incredible spot for community events in the summer. We are looking forward to returning!

We really enjoyed our stay in the cabin - friendly hosts, yummy breakfast treats, comfortable space for two adults and two small kids. Perfectly located for skiing at Sunlight Mountain and an easy trip into town. Thanks!

Quaint, charming cabin tucked away on a beautiful piece of property. A great place to decompress! Part of the charm is meeting the hosts Jim and Sheryl who are welcoming and warm upon arrival! The breakfast that was delivered daily was absolutely the best! The scones and quiches were nothing short of amazing! I would highly recommend this little piece of heaven to anyone looking for a peaceful getaway!

Very cozy, surrounded by nature, host are very sweet, clean, the barn is amazing and for sure will be back:)))
Lisa

This place is so cute. The barn that you can explore is such a cool feature, it’s a concert hall and they do shows in the summer! Jim and Sharill bring you the cutest breakfast every morning of homemade quiches and scones and juice. The cabin we stayed in was so cozy and cute. We should have brought a better equipped car for the snow this time of year and we got stuck twice, but Jim and Sharill totally saved us and we couldn’t be more grateful. Can’t say enough nice things about this place. Really great spot for relaxing and so close to the hot springs. Thanks so much Jim and Sharill!!!!

Jim & Carol take incredible pride int their B&B and community. Peaceful and charming location with everything you could possibly need in your room and the main house. Close to Sunlight Mountain, Glenwood & Carbondale. Highly recommend. We will be back.

We had a fantastic time at 4 mile creek b&b! It was exactly what we were looking for. Comfortable, peaceful and delicious breakfast each day. 7 minutes from Sunlight Mtn ski resort. 20 min from downtown Glenwood Springs- close enough, but away from it all. Beautiful property, our dogs loved playing in the snow. Much cozier for our dogs than a hotel. Jim and Sharill were kind and welcoming. They shared details of their home and history and welcomed us on their property. We would definitely stay again.
We are delighted , the breakfast he left us was too rich and healthy . We would book here again
Great cozy spot in the mountains. Right next to skiing. Very quiet area made for a pleasant restful night.
Jim and his family have created such a welcoming, interesting, lovely Bed & Breakfast on a beautiful, ideally located property. We hope to come back.
Cosy, rustic, and delicious complimentary breakie. Joe was a lovely host.
Such a peaceful locale with kind and thoughtful hosts.
A definite must-see - the breakfast trays with frittatas and fresh orange juice are a fantastic start for anyone exploring Glenwood. Bonus: all the stars you can see once you’re on the property.

We loved staying at Four Mile Creek! Cheryl and Jim are so sweet, and the property is totally gorgeous. The cabin was very cosy and they had a fire pit going outdoors so we could enjoy the great stargazing even in november.

This place is delightful! The breakfast is amazing as well. We spent only 2 nights and wish we had more time. Very peaceful. Jim also provided DVDs which were awesome after spending the day at the hot springs. We will be back, hopefully in the summer when they have live music in the beautiful theater barn!
Cozy place with an amazing breakfast. Worked really well for our quick trip through glenwood springs.
Unique place with lot of history. Quieted but not far from city

Jim's cabin was clean and cozy, check in was a breeze. In and around the property is filled with whimsical and historical items. Access was easy and area scenery is beautiful! Be sure to save some time to read some of the books Jim wrote.
Lovely quaint accommodations! We had a quick one night stay and would definitely stay again when back in the area. The owners are very hospitable.

We had a lovely 2-night stay in a rustic cabin B&B located south of Glenwood. The location was very convenient to hiking near Sunlight Ski Resort. What an incredible place and incredible people who run the B&B. They were kind, helpful, and you could tell they love what they do. I thoroughly enjoyed the property- the creek was beautiful background noise to an evening of reading and drinking a glass of wine in one of the many outdoor seating areas. I love how eclectic and inviting the space is. Clean as well. Breakfast was delicious. Beautiful hiking spots near by (a recommendation from Jim). The aspens were breathtaking. I now love this part of Colorado and will make sure to stay here again and again!

Friendly welcome when we arrived, rustic cabin interior under the fall colors, sleeping with windows open next to a babbling brook, and a delicious breakfast and coffee in the fridge ready to start the next day. The entire property has so much history and areas to relax. What more can you ask for? Looking forward to coming back next summer for some live music upstairs in the barn.

Honestly I don't think you could ask for more. The property is very unique, and Jim is an incredible host. For my wife and I we felt like we were visiting friends. The creek that runs through the property is so relaxing it lulls you to sleep at night. The scenery is beautiful.
Amazing quite place. Extremely relaxing.
Jim and his wife are excellent hosts. This is a really special place, and I can't recommend it enough. The cabin was so cozy and peaceful. Breakfast was perfect. Can't wait to return!
Delightfully quaint and comfortable in beautiful surroundings. Amazing hosts make the stay even more memorable. Perfect for a reset and recharge.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed staying at the bed and breakfast. The landscape was perfect. The cabin is bigger than anticipated. The pictures don’t do this place Justice. The sound of the creek is very peaceful. We will definitely try to go back.
Great location and hospitality. Very much enjoyed the stay.

My family had such a wonderful time staying at the Creekside Cabin. Everything was idyllic and beautiful, this B&B is such a gem. The hosts entertained all of our 5 year old son's inquiries and shared their home with us! We look forward to staying again in the future.
Beautiful property. Lovely hosts, very welcoming. Delicious breakfast.
Great stay . Breakfast that was supplied every day was delicious, Cabin was comfy and exactly as described. Creek was right outside window and entire location peaceful . Will absolutely stay again.
Cute little spot with great hosts!

Wonderful stay!
Beautiful place.
Super comfortable.

We stayed in the Creekside Cabin for two nights and had a great time. Jim and his wife were fantastic hosts and extremely friendly. The creek is stunning and the grounds are fun to explore. Homemade breakfast each morning was a nice addition!
Jim was very communicative and my family had a great stay!
We had a fabulous stay at the Creekside Cottage. Our hosts, Jim and Sherril, were welcoming and friendly, the setting was so peaceful and relaxing, and the breakfast was delicious.
Absolutely loved this bed-and-breakfast. The hosts were so sweet and accommodating. And the location was beautiful. We had a fun and relaxing time!

Incredible stay! Character and quality. Hosts are amazing and personable. Our family of 4 fit just great and loved the open windows to listen to the creek all night. Wish we could have stayed longer or been there during one of the concert nights.
What a gorgeous, lovely spot!! We definitely want to return!!
Great place! Jim & his wife Cheryl really made the bed & breakfast so cute with so many awesome touches. We only had one night but throughly enjoyed it & are already planning to come back

The cabin was exactly what we needed for a quiet getaway in Glenwood Springs and our pup Carlton loved it also. Beautiful creek side property, we opened our windows and relaxed listening to the water bustling away. Great breakfast goodies, hospitality and so much history to explore and enjoy. Only about 10 minutes to downtown Springs, 20 to Carbondale and and hour to Aspen. Wonderful location and people. Wish we were there for the live entertainment but we will be back!
We had a great stay at 4 mile creek and hope to return someday.
Jim is a wonderful and friendly host. Our family had a great stay and appreciated the beautiful, cozy spot along the creek.

My husband, son, and I had a wonderful stay in this rustic cabin. It was beautiful and serene overlooking the creek beside it. We were supplied with homemade breakfast treats each day, as well, which was a nice touch.
Jim and his wife are super nice and friendly people and I spent a good deal of time just shooting the breeze with them. They even invited us to a live music and potluck event being hosted in their barn, which we very much enjoyed.
If you are looking for serenity and rustic charm, stay here in Glenwood Springs.
Lovely property! Really enjoyed walking the grounds with our son. He didn’t want to leave the creek. Definitely a unique place with wonderful owners.
We loved our stay! It was clean, gorgeous location, and yummy breakfast!

Beautiful spot by the river. Hosts make it even more special with their hospitality, conversation, and collections of art. And the short drive there is breathtaking.
This is the place!

Four Mile Creek B& B is a really special place about halfway between Glenwood Springs and Carbondale... If you're booking a room here, seriously consider actually spending some time on the property - explore the barn (their music venue!) and the museum, take time to notice the sculptures and fun things that have been placed around the property, sit by the creek, and chat with Jim and Sharill who are full of stories about the area and their experiences at Four Mile Creek. I spent 4 nights there for some deep rest and relaxation, and loved every minute of it. The cabin was cozy and clean and the kitchen had everything I needed to prepare simple meals. The creek (which can be raging in the springtime!) lulled me to sleep. Wifi is good, if you want that. Loved eating meals on the bank of the creek, and sitting on the sunny deck in front of the potting shed with my book. I can't wait to go back!
Had such an amazing time. It is a beautiful property with a lot to explore.
We had a fantastic stay at this lovely bed and breakfast. It was a great location even with our two babies. We look forward to coming back to enjoy the romantic setting when it's just the two of us!

Jim’s bed and breakfast is everything that made Airbnb good: warm hosts who have truly out their heart into the place, a cozy space to rest and relax, and a unique experience in a gorgeous part of Colorado. We will be back! Thank you again for the hospitality and warmth!

4 Mile Creek Bed & Breakfast is truly adorable. It's a wonderful historic homestead that Jim and Sharill have lovingly restored, and it has a few buildings that they have set up as homage to the original owners of the property. They are welcoming, warm, have a host of stories to share if you are interested, and they make quite the delicious breakfast. Jim made our arrival nice and easy as well even though we arrived quite late. The cabins are cozy and right next to the namesake creek, making for the perfect bedtime lullaby. The cottage was spacious and cozy, and although we didn't bring our dog, we plan to next time we visit. The location is also remote enough to feel calm while still having easy access to Carbondale and Glenwood Springs. Highly recommend a visit! We didn't realize how cute and unique this place would be until we arrived, but it was a wonderful surprise.

We loved our stay here! The creek outside was so relaxing and we loved walking the grounds with our dog. Jim and Sharill were so welcoming and left us some delicious homemade breakfast, juice, and coffee every morning. 10/10 recommend!
Was a lovely place with lots of thoughtful details. Would stay again for sure!

We had so much fun staying here with our friends last weekend! The property is a dream and we loved the little cabin that we stayed in. Falling asleep to the sounds of the river and waking up to the best breakfast ever was really the cherry on top. We had fun exploring the barn-turned-music venue, talking with the super sweet hosts, and hanging out with our friends in the teepee. Being able to bring our dogs with us made this trip extra special :) we loved this place and can’t wait to return!
Great place, built with lots of love.
Great hospitality, lovely location, serene atmosphere, yummy breakfasts! Would 100% recommend!
Great place to stay close to sunlight mountain and only an hour drive to aspen
Jim is a great host. It was a pleasure to stay here. Cozy and in a great location.
A magical place to stay! Jim and Sheryl are the best!
Excellent place to stay, it is cozy and they offer breakfast. Jim is very kind and will make anyone feel welcome. It is a 15 drive from Glenwood and Iron mountain springs. Definitely recommend!

Jim and his wife are as kind as they are interesting. Getting to chat with them and hear stories of the property was a highlight for sure. As was waking up to the sound of a winter creek and hot coffee + thoughtful breakfast. 10 / 10 - book this place! It’s so rare to find such sweet hidden little gems like this these days.

This stay was one of a kind. Jim and his wife have made this place charming and inviting. Hand made art and artifacts, as well as antique gems carefully decorate the yard and surrounding cabins. The hosts were so authentic, kind and provided a delicious fresh breakfast for us each morning, the scones were my fav. Overall it was wonderful.
This was a wonderful little stay - the cottage was cozy, Jim was very welcoming and helpful, our dogs loved it. The breakfast was delicious, too! We will definitely be back.

Loved Jim’s place. My brother and I stayed there while visiting for the xgames in Aspen. Loved the history of the property, which Jim shared with us. He and his wife left breakfast in the fridge each night for the following morning and I loved it so much actually bought some of his recipes.
Overall great stay, will actually likely come back again.
impeccable communication and good will

Beautiful cabin! The hospitality was the best my wife and I have ever received through any Airbnb we have stayed in. We would love to be back in the spring or summer months to soak in the scenery when it isn’t snowing. Highly recommend this place!

Cute and cozy little cabin. Everything we were looking for in a long weekend getaway.
