What an amazing place! Prob my fave Airbnb. Such a lovely cabin.
We had an amazing time at Jim’s place. The cabin was clean and organized, and Jim was also very friendly and attentive with our requests. It was a great experience to stay in his place!
Great place to stay! Super relaxing and the hosts are super welcoming, friendly, and kind. Highly recommend!

What a beautiful Thanksgiving we had staying with Jim and Sharill! These cabins are in a beautiful canyon right above glenwood springs! Not only we’re Jim and Sharill easy to get in contact with, they were absolutely delightful to talk to! They took us around the property and shared the history of it with us. We also loved the teepee! If you are looking for a easy, tranquil, serene stay; four mile creek bed and breakfast is the only option! Thank you so much for a wonderful experience!

We have stayed at so many cabins across the country and this is by far the best overall experience we have EVER had. The ambiance, the friendliness of the hosts, and the coziness of the cabin were everything we could have hoped for.

Such a beautiful cabin in a wonderful location. The breakfast was delicious and greatly appreciated. Would highly recommend you walk around the grounds and get a feel for all the character. Definitely coming back!
An absolutely charming and delightful place to stay, and with a delicious breakfast!

AWESOME western log cabin expierence! Jim and Sherryl were excellent hosts in providing a comfortable mountain getaway with creature comforts including very clean and colorful amenities, electric heating, strong running water and Wi-Fi with the added ambience of soothing sounds from the rippling brook just outside the cabin window. We are already planning a return visit to include family next year. Wayne and Freida

We enjoyed our stay at the cabin and would definitely return. It's about 5 miles from downtown Glenwood Springs on a beautiful property which we loved to explore. The breakfast tray left in the fridge is such a nice touch. Jim and his wife take pride in their property and making sure guests enjoy their stay. They also had great recommendations for restaurants. There is currently construction on the road to the cabin, and at certain times we had to wait about 7-8 minutes before going down the one lane road. It was not a big deal, but just something to be aware of.
Jim’s place is absolutely gorgeous! We loved leaving the window open at night to hear the creek. So peaceful

This was a really cozy cabin just outside of Glennwood Springs. Loved the area and Jim recommended some great side trips we could take our Wrangler on to see more of the country side which we eagerly took. Thanks again, Jim!
Unique and Wonderful place to stay... off the beaten path and a great value. The hosts are the kindest people and we will definitely be back !
Loved this out-of-the-way retreat. Dozed off to the creek, woke to the birds. Jim is a wonderful host. just what I was looking for.

We stayed here for our one year anniversary and had the most wonderful time. Jim & Cheryl are so sweet, we were able to chat with them and get to know more about the history of the property. It’s eclectic, historic, and serene. Our dogs loved exploring around. The breakfast was fantastic! We even bought one of the cookbooks they sell in their gift shop. We’re planning on making this an annual trip because we loved it so much!
Great experience :)
This place is absolutely stunning and very relaxing. Close to downtown and all the hot springs. The hosts were kind and creative and provided a very beautiful place to stay for the weekend.

Jim's cottage was rustic but comfortable and Jim and his wife were great hosts. The property was gorgeous and the provided breakfast was delicious. We only had one night to enjoy the place but I would like to go back again someday.

This was an adorable little creek side cabin in a quiet and remote location. Jim and his wife Sharill have homemade items for breakfast that were very delicious! Aside from the road construction that was going on while we were there, it is a quick drive from Glenwood Springs. We were only here for one night, but Jim offers a lot to see and do on the property during your stay. We would have loved to experience these things had we not had such a tight schedule.
These are older cabins, but my friend and I noticed several cob webs and a large amount of dust on the wood beams in the ceiling, both of which should have been cleaned before our stay.
Most AirBnB hosts provide the WiFi information in their arrival message or it is posted inside the rental. We didn’t have cell service without the password to the WiFi. You must have to request it from Jim.
Cute little Airbnb. Very nice having breakfast and our own little cabin!
older log cabin next to a babbling brook that you can hear with the windows open. Jim and Sharill are amazing hosts and breakfast was homemade

Staying at the 4 Mile was a terrific experience. Jim and Sheryl are fantastic hosts- friendly and accommodating. The B&B is in a great location- remote but still easy access to both Glenwood Springs and Carbondale. And the morning breakfasts from Sheryl were lovely and thoughtful! Thank you, Jim and Sheryl.

The Creekside Cabin was a lovely respite from the city. After busy and active days, we loved coming back to the cabin to relax and listen to the creek. Jim and Sharill are delightful hosts who provided helpful tips and suggestions. Keep in mind the cabin is modest--you won't be able to cook a fancy meal, and the facilities are basic--but it is spotlessly clean, a budget-friendly price, and just what you need for a quiet time away. I wish I had a creek to listen to as I fall asleep every night. Overall a lovely and tranquil stay, and we hope to be back!
Awesome people and a beautiful place!

This place was a lot of fun! Jim and Sharill were the best hosts we’ve ever had, too many things to list! We enjoyed the property and all of the cool things to see, it was like getting a free tour with your stay! Jim and Sharill were so kind and great to visit with. Loved Sharill’s earings and OMG her cooking was amazing! Definitely recommend staying on this charming little farm!

This beautiful little gem of a property is not to be missed! We loved the Serene and tranquil surroundings from the babbling creek to the cozy accommodations and all the amazing eclectic things they have collected and decorated with throughout the years! Such a neat property to explore and learn about the history from Jim and Sharrill. We appreciated how amazing our hosts were with recommendations for great places to eat, a stunning, easily accessible scenic drive recommended by Jim with a map provided was incredibly helpful and appreciated. Sharill makes beautiful jewelry, and probably some of the best toffee bars I’ve ever had in my life and oh my was the breakfast they provided beautifully done as well! Overall our experience was perfect and I look forward to returning and recommending to everyone I know! Thank you both for my best Airbnb experience to date.
Awesome property with so many interesting things to check out. Friendly hosts that go the extra mile to make their guests’ stay memorable.

Our favorite Airbnb to date so far. The land was beautiful and peaceful. The hosts are amazing, genuine, friendly, and helpful! The breakfast every morning was wonderful and delicious! Would absolutely recommend this stay to all!

Jim and Sharill's sanctuary is a beautiful labor of love. We only spent one night but our family loved the cozy accommodations, full kitchen, creekside country location, and outdoor spaces. Our children swang on the rope swing, explored the many plants, including beautiful herbs and wildflowers. The underground teepee and cowboy museum were real treats. But the best part was interacting with both Jim and Sharill. We loved hearing their stories and they gave great advice and directions.
The cabin was perfect for a quiet weekend of hiking and hot springs. The cabin was cool, comfortable, and breakfast was perfect.
Rustic cabin on a great piece of land! There is a stream, lake and lots of fun things to check out! Would recommend.
Beautiful property, you can hear the creek rushing all night long. Breakfast was well rounded and delicious. Lots of grassy areas to walk the dogs.

5 Stars in all categories did not fully express our joy and satisfaction with Cheryl and Jim's awesome Creekside Cabin. They are wonderful, kind, and generous people with integrity. The value of our experience was immense. Their complimentary breakfasts were fine restaurant-quality meals in presentation and flavor. The Cabin was charming, comfortable, clean, fully functional, and safe. We slept well and relaxed while savoring the gurgling creek and crisp air. Cheryl and Jim were accommodating hosts eager to please and help us. They recommended walking/biking trails, better traveling routes, restaurants, shops, etc. Their pricing format is lodger-friendly with no fees for cleaning or dogs. The ambiance of their Cabin with their spacious property's wonders to explore, including their teepee, cowboy tribute room, and barn auditorium, are appealing. We will return and confidently recommend Cheryl, Jim, and Four Mile Creek B&B to our family and friends. Cheers to their humble greatness.
This is a very charming B and B. Such a gorgeous setting and amazing hospitality! We loved being Creekside. And couldn’t have imagined how charming this was going to be. We will definitely be back.

The only bad part about my family’s stay here was when we had to leave. Such a great time here! We could have gone without stepping foot off the property and been just as happy.
To begin, Jim and Cheryl were such lovely hosts. We were supplied fresh fruit and juice every morning to my daughter’s delight. We fell asleep to calming sounds of gentle waters flowing by our cabin. The property was large and offered many places to explore.
I highly recommend this to other families. Your kids will thank you for the experience.

Incredible place to stay and spend quality time in this cozy cabin by the creek. Absolutely breathtaking scenes and breakfast by the creek in the morning was an extra perk. Breakfast was delicious and our guests were so welcoming.

Where do I even begin? Jim and Cheryl were exceptionally hospitable. Their attention to design makes it so that each part of the property has it's very own western aesthetic. Cheryl makes the best almond bark, and Jim certainly knows his way around the area. The breakfast was amazing, and we saw all kinds of wildlife while we were there!

This was the perfect getaway for me. Jim's property provides many opportunities to be introspective and reconnect with oneself. I would highly recommend it to anyone who feels bombarded by life and the hustle.
Jim and Sharill are welcoming and wonderful hosts. The property is truly magical and a delightful place to relax and enjoy the incredible beauty.
Great spot to get away from everything. So much fun and brings you back to the old days. A live in museum! A very delicious breakfast was in the fridge.

We had a great time. Sharill and Jim are gracious hosts. The Creekside was exactly what we were looking for as an escape from Denver. Take time to wander the property, smell the air, check out the barn and bunk, look at the stars, and listen to the creek.

The creek! The barn! The rustic charm and thoughtful hosts make this place a must! GREAT for a family of 4 and a dog. Minutes away for great skiing also at Sunlight and a gorgeous backroad to the gem of Carbondale.
Saved a lot of $ since we used the the kitchen in our own little cabin for most meals. The breakfast provided was super yummy!! Would recommend 100%

My daughter and I stated at the Creekside Cabin for a short weekend getaway. It was great! We were in the smallest cabin which was perfect for the 2 of us. The B&B is rustic but charming. Jim and his wife were wonderful hosts and we look forward to going back in the near future. My daughters comment was "I'm not sure why anyone would ever want to leave".
:]

My husband and I, along with our aging pup, had a great stay at Four Mile. We loved the sound of the running water outside our window, the warm hospitality and conversation of the hosts, and the proximity to Sunlight ski resort. The daily breakfast provided was a real treat and the hosts were responsive when we needed a kitchen cleaning essential. The atmosphere was rugged, charming, and slow - just what we needed and wanted to have a true respite from the city and distractions. The accommodation of the Creekside Cabin was modest but had everything we needed to slow down and have a meaningful weekend trip. Multiple walks around the property in the fresh snowfall were a real treat. We’d recommend this option if you’re looking to slow down and/or reconnect with some of the best simple pleasures in life.

We loved our stay in the CreekSide Cabin! The gorgeous mountain location was exactly the peaceful retreat under the stars that we needed. The authentic, creative touches like the cowboy bunker museum and renovated barn theatre were so fun to explore and the home-baked apple tarts for breakfast were killer. Perfect distance from hot springs and skiing, plus stunning views while driving through the mountains.
Great place to stay. Highly recommend.

It was a pleasure to stay at Red mill bed and breakfast. Jim and his wife were extremely nice and welcoming. The location was perfect. The breakfast tray was a nice touch. Would highly recommend to anyone.
Come here to see ALL the stars and enjoy the peace and quiet in a delightfully quaint cabin. We're definitely coming back.
I definitely recommend this place!!
This cabin was super cute and cozy and located just far enough outside of town to feel remote. Jim and Shirill are great hosts.

Somewhat of a random find - but an absolute gem that will always be on my radar from here on out. The live music theater in the barn looks like a crazy good time in the warmer months.
I suggest checking out their website for more info and photos.
Either way - Jim and his wife’s B&B will exceed your expectations.
db
Great place in Glenwood. Nice breakfast platter waiting for us in the morning.
This Bed and Breakfast i a cozy gem tucked in the mountains.

Jim’s and Shrill’s place is incredible. We were only there for one night, but it was fun to wake up to discover a magical land covered in snow. We chatted with the hosts and had a chance to check out the theater in the barn and see Sherill’s jewelry. Great hosts and what a fun experience! We’d love to come back. Definitely recommend!

It’s perfect, located in the mountains and covered in snow, the grounds are vast and a great time to explore. The hosts are lovely and the trip was all we could’ve asked for and more. The breakfast was amazing. We’ll definitely be back, maybe in the summer next time to see all the greenery!
We had a great time. The historic touches were fantastic. Laid back and great hosts

This place was a perfect getaway! Jim and Cherill were amazing and very kind hosts + the breakfast was delicious!
Thank you for a quiet, relaxing retreat!

What a gem. The vibe- honesty, simplicity, authenticity and charm. An old soul charm with kindness that facilitated a relaxing respite and promotes exploration ad thought on history. The beds are impeccably made and comfortable. My large boys, my husband and myself were so happy here. We watched movies and played games around the table. It was like taking a step back in time to a slower way of life, something my husband and I deeply crave. The proximity to ski areas like Sunlight Mt. ( super awesome for kids and budget) and hotsprings both in Glenwood and Redstone are just a bonus of this property, the real and most impressive part are the sweet owners and keepers of this peace of earth. They are excellent stewards of the gift they have been given and it shows in every detail. My family and I felt blessed to be there and loved are brief 48 hour stay and will be back. The scones are amazing! =) This place IS Colorado at its best. - the LaCours
Great place to rest!
This place is worth the price. It is super clean and has everything you need. The shower is remarkable, and it is walking distance to the springs and all the great restaurants.
Perfect place for my wife and I. Close to everything. It’s been updated and looks great!
Great place in a perfect location!

Beautiful home and very peaceful! We loved the close proximity to attractions and restaurants. Check in and out instructions were very clear and it felt so much nicer than a hotel. The washer and dryer in-unit were a game changer especially with the hot springs nearby.
We had a great stay! Very convenient location within a quick walk to our favorite restaurants. Cute space with a nice courtyard too. Overall we enjoyed it!
This airbnb was very cute and cozy! It was in a good area with lots of things around within walking distance and very very clean! Would go again!
Dustin’s space is an amazing spot! It is clean and the location is fabulous. Dustin communicated well. I will be staying here again!

Very clean and centrally located. Would prefer if there were more curtains (on all windows that were not frosted) for privacy. The bedroom does have curtains. The rental is a split between another unit that is under construction. Once you find the separate door, it is easy to access.
Loved it! So cute and perfect location!

Cozy and comfy place for hubby and I to rest and relax for three nights. The amenities were great as well. We cooked breakfast and dinner in the well stocked kitchen. The washer and dryer in the unit were helpful too. Would definitely stay here again! I highly recommend you do too.

We enjoyed a 4 night stay at Dustin's place which is an excellent location close to all things downtown and the hot springs. The kitchen is well stocked with cooking supplies like pots, pans and utensils which was nice since we cooked a majority of our meals.
It is nice to have off street parking since virtually everyplace you want to visit downtown or the hot spring are an easy walk. The location is quiet, free from noisy neighbors or street traffic.
We will add Dustin's place to our list when we revisit again.
What a cute house! Had all we need. Extremely clean and efficient! Thank you for sharing your home Dustin! We will be back! ☺️
if the price is right, this place is perfect for glenwood. Loved it. Well decorated too. Walking distance from downtown. Parking spot is good for an suv but not a big truck.
Great place!! Walking distance to restaurants. Easy to find with the instructions given. Would come back!

Phenomenal location and great property! I absolutely loved the bathroom and all of the decor. Perfect little spot for our weekend getaway. If we come back to Glenwood we will definitely be securing this spot with Dustin again!
Really enjoyed this BNB, highly recommend! Very close to restaurants, great hospitality, very neat, comfy, and clean. Dustin was also very responsive. Thank you ✨
Great cozy spot in Glenwood Springs. The location is super close to many restaurants and bars. Highly recommend this spot for a nice getaway!
Was a great and beautiful place 💕 best place if ever we stayed at while coming to glenwood, will for sure be back poling this place when i come back.

Dustin was a phenomenal host! Incredibly accommodating for me and my girlfriend.
Incredibly happy to have had this place to stay while visiting from Denver!
10/10 would stay again.
Thank you!!

Loved the place. It was homey and comfortable. Dustin was even accommodating about the parking situation because of our huge SUV. The place is literally within walking distance to an array of restaurants and things to do. Wish I could have stayed longer but def recommend !

Wow! what a beautifully decorated home that was right in the middle of town. We stayed at Dustin's place while visiting Iron Mountain Hot Springs and everything was 5 minutes away. We had one of the best meals ever at Pullman and it was only a 4 minute walk. The home was spotless, which made it an enjoyable stay.
Beautiful cozy winter stay!
Dustin place was an amazing get a way for the night. Was super close to everything downtown. Definitely plan on renting again.
Was an ideal location for us as it was walkable to all of the places we wanted to go. Was very quiet and was able to relax. Thank you!
I can see why this is a guest favorite. A nice space blending original and contemporary and impeccably maintained. For a private home it couldn't be in a better location in G. Springs.

Dustin was super responsive and great to work with. Great location if you're taking the train in. The place was cozy and clean.
I'd stay there again.
Great stay.
Dustin’s place is well finished with attention to detail. Clean and conveniently walkable. Highly recommended.
Dustin’s place was super cute and had everything we needed to cook our New Year’s dinner. We would definitely stay here again!
Great location, great stay, will return!

My husband and I had an awesome long weekend here! The location couldn’t be better - very walkable to so many restaurants, Hotel Colorado, & breweries! The place was lovely, private and very cozy & “Hygge,” so it was easy to make ourselves at home. They did a beautiful job with everything, it was excellent. It snowed in Glenwood all weekend, which was gorgeous.
The house had all the amenities we needed and they even shoveled the snow & salted the walkways and around our car each day, which was really helpful and thoughtful as well.
If I was critiquing anything, it would be pretty helpful to have curtains on the kitchen/dining windows for privacy, as there are cameras in the courtyard pointing toward the house. And perhaps a few more hooks throughout the house & bathroom to hang clothing.
We would definitely love to return and truly enjoyed our time here! Absolutely recommend!

This place is in a phenomenal location- super walkable to downtown and feels private. It was also decorated beautifully and cozy. Pay attention to check in information if arriving after dark (and the provided map) because it can be a little tricky to find in the dark. We loved it!

This was such a cute little unit. It had everything we needed for our stay. Being super close to downtown restaurants/shops made it super convenient. Would definitely recommend and would stay here if ever in Glenwood again!

This was the perfect spot to spend a few days, and we will absolutely try to snag this spot again if we do another trip. The place itself is so cozy and comfortable and beautifully put together, we felt like we were at someone's real home. And the neighborhood is very quiet, but very walkable with just a couple blocks to several great restaurants and only a bit further for groceries or the pool.

Dustin’s place is small but really well (professionally) designed and perfect for a couple. The unit is functional and beautiful. After finding the parking in the alley we noticed some wonderful aromas coming from the west…turns out is was the Masala and Curry restaurant; the food was great! Cooper Wine and Spirits next door. Nice bottle shop. Be aware there is the typical noise associated from being in town. We enjoying being in the thick of things; we parked and car and didn’t drive for two days. Also we really enjoyed the outdoor courtyard area. Places like Dustin’s are what keep us coming back to Air bnb. Thank you Dustin. A+.
What a lovely place! Charming, and a very short walk to the center of town. Having no dishwasher was a small inconvenience. The patio is delightful.
Great location and secluded but close to everything.
This place was perfect for our couple’s getaway! Dustin was great!
Dustin’s one bedroom hideaway was so cute and homie. Location was perfect. I loved the private entrance, the shower and ceilings. Thank you for being a great host! We’ll be back.

Dustin’s place was the perfect home base for exploring the Roaring Fork Valley. Walkable to downtown Glenwood Springs. The cozy cottage feel and privacy of this accommodation is why I would highly recommend. Look forward to staying again.

Dustin’s home was a perfect place for us to relax and experience the heart of Glenwood Springs. We loved that we could easily walk to a variety of restaurants, and that it was still tucked away in a peaceful/quiet spot. The home looks unassuming from the outside but is fully renovated, homey, and clean inside (with fun decor!). Great accommodations for me, my husband, and our one-year old (slept in our pack n play). Highly recommend!

We had an amazing trip. Glenwood’s best attractions are 90% walkable from here. The home seems recently renovated, it’s gorgeous inside. Dustin was responsive and this place is a treasure. We will back!
Great place to stay in Glenwood!
Wonderful place to stay in Glenwood. Quaint, homey, clean and excellent location!

My wife and I were in Glenwood Springs to celebrate my 50th Class Reunion (1973) from Glenwood Springs High School in mid-September. The location of this beautiful place was perfect. Downtown restaurants, shops, and amenities - including the Hot Springs Pool - are all within a 10 minute walk. Yet, this lodging is secluded in the loveliest setting. As much as we wanted to get home, we were very sad to leave this secluded gem.
This place is perfect for anyone visiting glenwood. Amazing location and an extremely comfortable space.
Cute house and you couldn’t wish for a better location. Photos are very accurate, although no snow in September:). And there’s been an added seating area outside. Would stay again!
Dustin was quick to respond to some minor concerns. Had a great time! Would definitely stay here again.

Fantastic location! Super responsive! I was traveling for work and didn’t have a rental car but because of the location I was still able to walk to work. Restaurants walking distance. One or two pick hiccups and he was responsive within 10 minutes. The place is perfect for solo or a couple. Washer and dryer is fantastic. All the kitchen utensils you would need. The bed was probably one of the most comfortable beds. I’ve slept in, and the linens were by far the best any Airbnb. Would definitely recommend.

This was a wonderful place. It was extremely clean and had everything we wanted. We really enjoyed the private little front porch area with the cozy loveseat. The kitchen was well stocked with cookware, dishes, coffee maker (drip), coffee, etc. Everything was very clean and the atmosphere was extremely inviting. The bed was very comfortable and with the portable AC in the bedroom, it made it cool enough to sleep at night. It was very close to downtown, but surprisingly quiet. The TV was easy to use, and intuitive. Overall, very pleased; we will be back.
Great location and very walkable to restaurants and Glenwood Hot Springs Pool! Cute little place.
Epic
Excellent place in a great location close to the main stretch of town.

Dustin's place looked exactly like the photos and his communication was very clear and responsive. The place was very small but worked well for us, as we spent most of our time out and about exploring the town and mountains. No A/C in July was a bit uncomfortable, but having a stand-up A/C unit in the bedroom helped keep us cool at night, and the mattress was super comfortable.
Dustin was a great host and has a great location for tapping into restaurants and bars. His place had a great vibe and encourage others to check out his place

Dustin's cottage was close to lots of restaurants which made it easy to stay parked and take a stroll. Despite being within walking distance of food, music, and activities, we were impressed with the peacefulness of the location. The cottage is situated in such a way that we were able to enjoy what felt like our very own private escape. It was a pleasant surprise considering the walkability of the cottage that the main noise we heard was the sound of birds singing. The cottage was simply perfect for my husband and me to get away and simply be able to focus on relaxing and rejuvenating.

Warm eclectic place to stay in the heart of downtown less than 1 block from AmTrak Station and 4 blocks from free local transport bus stop. Not your typical, sterile AirBnb with numerous rustic and interesting furnishings. Peaceful private outdoor setting as well to chill and relax. Would definitely stay there again.

Highly recommend the stay! It was out of my origional price range, but was well worth it, considering I didn't drive any more than 5 minutes. Everything else was in walking distance, and I loved that.
This is a great little house in a perfect location to see all that Glenwood Springs has to offer!
Really beautiful thoughtfully designed place. Back patio was peaceful and kitchen was well equipped. Loved the shower too:). Walked to everything. Location was absolutely perfect!

Dustin’s place was perfect. Fantastic location downtown Glenwood Springs with walking distance to everything. There was a slight complication with the key pad entry day one but he had already planned for that and we got in easily. The place was extremely clean and we couldn’t have asked for anything better. Thank you!

Dustin highly responsive and attentive. Place was very small, looked like the photos, just much smaller than I anticipated. Located so close to town that we could walk everywhere which was a great bonus. Overall, a decent place to stay for 2 people.

My wife and I really enjoyed our week stay here. The place was quiet and the amenities were great. We loved the fact that we were within walking distance to shops, restaurants, hot springs, and even the adventure park is walkable. Dustin was very responsive as well. We would definitely come back again.

This place was lovely! Will definitely be back. It was nicely decorated, right near the best restaurants and even the hot springs! It was quiet, comfortable, and honestly great. Stay here! Seems too good to be true, but it’s the real deal. Would be perfect for 2 people to relax.
Thank you! You are very thorough & communicative.
Great place! Walking distance from many restaurants and the hot springs! Had a wonderful time and would def stay again. Thank you!!
This is my second stay at Dustin’s property. The location is unbeatable and his home is spotless I plan on staying a third time!!!
We had an amazing stay at Dustin’s place. Well decorated and super close to downtown restaurants. Would come back.

Such a cute, quaint place to stay. It was perfect for a quick getaway and was close to the restaurants and shops in downtown Glenwood springs. The bed was so comfortable and it was nice having a washer and dryer for our clothes. Dustin was super responsive to everything we needed. We would definitely stay again!

Everything in Dustin’s place was amazing and super cozy. Place was super clean. I don’t usually walk in my socks 🧦 when I’m at a hotel or any other lodging place due to, for me, I feel the flooring is dirty. Well, that did not happened to me at Dustin’s place at all!!! I was walking in my socks up and down the place 🙂🙂.
Only thing I would suggest, is curtains in both kitchen windows for privacy. The sink window is right in front of a tall building that has windows facing the place and they can see down from there. The eating area window faces the outside part by the entrance. However, there is a security camera facing that direction and you can feel a little invaded. The camera is perfect given that faces the entrance, as long as you have a curtain in the window.
Other that the two curtains, I give the place a 5/5 ⭐️
This place is cute and cozy. It was exactly as expected from the description and photos. The bed was comfortable and it was quiet despite being in town. I will stay there again!

The Airbnb was cozy, cute, and we loved the little sugar cookies. Good water pressure and nice body wash too! The best part was getting to feed the cute alpacas and see them out the windows during our stay! 🥰

Super clean and presented exactly like the pictures. Kim and the alpacas are very friendly. Appreciated all the recommendations of things to do in the area if I were staying longer. Would definitely stay again next time I’m passing through the area. Also would highly recommend checking out their boutique because there is a lot of cute stuff in there!

This is my second time staying on the alpaca farm . It is amazing. I stayed in the smaller cabin this time . Last time we stayed in the bigger house . Both places are amazing. I will be back on a couple of years . It is a happy place for me .
Such a fantastic experience. The cottage was beautiful and having the alpachas around was such fun. Highly recommend!

Kim and the Alpaca Farm were amazing! Such a beautiful place to stay and visit! The Alpacas were amazing and definitely did not disappoint! Kim and Cory were just awesome hosts and we will definitely be back! We have told all our friends about the place and have recommended it to them all! The studio set up was super clean and even better in person! Thanks againKim and Cory for letting us stay at your farm!!!
Everything was great! Thanks!!

Amazing stay! Came here to celebrate my birthday and loved every minute of it. Highly recommend if you love pretty mountain sunsets and animals. The new born baby alpaca was the cutest little guy I’ve ever seen.
We had such an unforgettable experience! The llamas and their babies were so great to interact with and watch! We would definitely stay again!
Comfortable and clean place! Great to have a variety of streaming services available on the TV when the sun went down. And the alpacas were fun to hangout with. Thanks, Kim!
Fantastic place to stay. The alpaca experience is way more enjoyable than I can even explain.

We had such a wonderful night at the Sopris Alpaca Farm! The Airbnb was very clean with gorgeous views, great restaurant recommendations, and of course the cutest Alpacas ever☺️ Could not recommend this stay enough.
We had a lovely stay. Thanks for everything, Kim!
Excelente
We had a wonderful stay! Hosts were friendly, alpacas were adorable and the place was clean. Looking forward to another stay!
Check in and out was a breeze! The alpacas were so much fun. It’s a beautiful property and the hosts were very friendly and helpful! Would stay again!
Very nice place to stay and disconnect from busy life. We loved the adorable alpacas.

My friend and I stayed for our birthdays and loved every minute! Seeing the alpacas was such a unique experience and we loved that the rental was only a short drive from rifle falls. Kim was kind and helpful during our entire stay, and we hope to come back in the future!

Silt and New Castle have some great restaurants, and it’s a quick trip into Glenwood Springs for more activities. Great for couples and families!

My fiancé and I had a whole lot of fun at this cottage. You get a lot of extra time with the alpacas, outside of the farm hours. We woke up and had breakfast outside and spent the sunset with the alpacas. It was quaint and clean and quiet. The view was beautiful, there was plenty to do in Glenwood Springs which is only 20 mins away. This was one of my most favorite airbnbs & I would definitely come back!

Our stay at Kim’s ranch was outstanding. We’ve lived in Colorado most our lives, but this little gem was a welcome surprise. It was a stopover for us from camping along the southwest border headed back to the front range and it was perfect. We were planning to rent a hotel room but in comparison Kim’s place was far better for the price. The construction of the tiny house/ barn is really high quality, cozy, and comfy. Plus Kim is super sweet and fun. And the alpacas! What a cool animal. They just wanted to hang with us and were so adorable on every level. We’ll definitely return the next chance we get. *Also, we had our 2 and 9 year old kids along, but I’m not 100% sure if this listing is intended for children. But they absolutely loved it. Alpacas are their new favorite animal and the house was super accommodating for them.
I had a great stay! The cottage was beautiful, perfectly furnished, clean, and comfortable. Kim was a great host.
Beautiful location, nice little get away. Kim was extremely nice and it was a great experience feeding the alpacas and visiting the boutique! Would recommend.
Great experience overall!
Loved our stay at Kim's place, the alpacas were out and about and the house was clean and cozy. Would love to go back soon!

This space was wonderful for two people, very clean and well equipped. We had such a great experience being with the alpacas and surrounded by plenty to do in the area. Kim was a great host and I highly recommend the stay.

Truly unique Air BnB experience. The actual cabin is amazing, but the proximity to the alpacas and the location made it even more memorable. Beautiful sunset from porch, as well. The cabin had sweet little touches everywhere from the alpaca cookies to coffee to local recc’s.
Amazing place to stay! Beautiful surroundings and such a clean comfy space! About 20 mins to downtown glenwood
This place was absolutely amazing. The cottage felt like our little home with a great view. Will definitely be coming back. Kim and Cory were super helpful and kind!!
This was a great and unique place to stay! We loved being able to interact with the alpacas and cats and the space was clean and cozy.

Our stay was a great experience with a very unique concept. Location was beautiful and getting to get up close to the Alpacas was fun. House was modern, clean and very good use of space.
It was raining the day we stayed so that added a peaceful sound to our sleep. Would definitely stay again.
Alpaca my bags here again! It was a quiet area, with great views. Waking up to alpacas was an awesome experience.
Very unique and fun experience. We enjoyed the alpacas as well as the lodging. We reccomend this to anyone wanting to try something a little different but in beautiful surroundings.

Oh my goodness, this place is a dream! If you found this gem and it is available, book it. It was the perfect size for a little getaway and nothing gets better than waking up to mountains and Alpacas. I definitely want to go back and would pay more for more Alpaca experiences (like eating with them, doing yoga with them, or whatnot). Highly recommend!
Great and peaceful stay!
Unique and pleasant stay in Colorado. Alpacas we’re amazing and very peaceful space. Would recommend!

Omgawdddd!! The alpaca 🦙 are amazing! Lennord was an amazing as well. (The black farm cat) Kim was an amazing host. Responded to all my questions prior to booking. Hands down the view! 😍😍😍 the place was PERFECT!! I 100% would stay here again. Best part was waking up to the alpaca 🦙. Thank youuuuu!

This place is an absolute DREAM! It was the most peaceful getaway for my fiancé and I. No pictures can do this place justice! It’s absolutely gorgeous and the alpacas were so friendly and fun to be around! Our favorite part was watching the sunset while feeding the alpacas, it was ultimate peace. The Airbnb was very cozy and warm + extra clean! I could’ve spent weeks there, highly recommend to anyone who is considering staying. You won’t regret it!
Loved it!

Words can’t describe how great our experience was. The space we had was perfect. Great kitchen and bathroom. Very comfy bed. Had a couch to relax on and tv if you wanted it. It was so clean and inviting and felt like home.
Kim has menus from local restaurants and suggestions of where to go for food and entertainment. We had farm fresh eggs waiting in the fridge and homemade alpaca cookies to greet us which were so good and impressively decorated.
Being able to roam the ranch and watch and hand feed the alpacas was an experience we will never forget. S’mores by the fire pit under the stars at night capped it all off. Kim was so friendly and shared some of her knowledge and story with us. All the personal little touches they had for us and everyone who visits daily was so amazing. Truly great and caring people. Can’t wait to visit again in the future!
Amazing Experience and very unique!
Alpaca bag anytime! Amazing cozy stay surrounded by so many fuzzy, friendly animals ☺️
Kim was very sweet and greeted us every time we saw each other. The Alpacas were an adventure and definitely not an experience you always get at an AirBnB!
We had the best time at this cottage! Amazing views and surrounded by the cutest alpacas. Near the hot springs, and peaceful location. Definitely recommend!!
Kim was such an AMAZING host! We loved the cute little cottage and of course the Alpacas! Highly recommend!

My girlfriend and I had a great time! :)
It was our one year anniversary and waking up on the farm with the alpacas was a perfect way to start our day. We ended up heading back east and made a pit stop at Vail Resorts to go skiing/snowboarding.
The heat was on when we arrived which was fantastic and I would totally recommend this spot to anyone looking for something extraordinary.
Thanks Kim & Cory!
Great place and great host. Truly enjoyed our stay.
Kim’s place was beautiful. It was a whole experience on its own. The alpacas are mostly friendly and very fun to be around. Would definitely recommend the experience!

We enjoyed the stay very much ..
meeting alpacas 🦙 was awesome experience!

The Chacra Cabin was easily one of the best Airbnbs that I have ever stayed in. The location was beautiful and peaceful while easily accessible to Glenwood Springs. Ali was a very responsive host and was kind enough to be flexible with my check-in time. I would absolutely stay here again with no hesitation, and highly recommend this cabin to anyone staying in the area!

My stay was fantastic, and everything we had hoped for was great! It was gorgeous, and I can't express how much we would love to visit again! Ali was a tremendous help when I was in a bind and was very responsive and helpful! I would recommend it to anyone!

This was a wonderful mountain stay, very relaxing and comfortable. Ali is a very accommodating host and we had an amazing stay! The location is great, only 10 minutes away from the main town and all the attractions, while still having a remote feel. The bed is so comfortable you will want to stay in it forever. Overall, we had an amazing stay and highly recommend this charming house!

The cabin was so cute! The views were great and the inside was spotless!! Lots of towels and kitchen supplies too.
And... holy cow was the bed comfy!!! No complaints! Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

This home was a birthday splurge and it was so idyllic. Gorgeous setting, the inside was decorated with thoughtful and beautiful items, and we so enjoyed the private mountain coziness. The views were amazing. The bed was so dang comfy, and it was a treat to spend the night here. Definitely recommend for a relaxing and sweet experience. Quiet and remote and only 10 minutes from town.
Loved it! Exactly how it was listed.

We loved Ali's place. The cabin is cozy and comfortable with unbeatable views. We were there for a whole week and felt right at home. Ali and her co-host were always willing to help with practical needs or in answering questions. We would absolutely stay again.
Be sure your car has a little bit of clearance to get up the final part of the road to the cabin. We were in a Chevy Malibu and made it just fine (not very high clearance) but anything lower riding would have been questionable.
Relaxing!
Very pleasant stay, loved the hike in the backyard as well! Grill was a little small but we made good use of it❤️

If you are considering staying at Chacra Cabin, do it! Not only is it tucked in to the most beautiful location with great hiking trails behind it, it's so cute and cozy. Ali was super responsive and helpful, and her dogs are super cute. We felt right at home.

Beautiful spot. Clean, comfortable, quiet, fun.
Shower was a bit small, but had a great time
Cute cozy cabin. Very clean and had everything you could need!

I toyed with the idea of leaving a really negative review to keep this place a secret and easier to book in the future, but the truth is that this was a wonderful place to stay and I plan on staying there again.
Really great place, comfortable and beautiful views. The lack of light pollution made for great stargazing. Great communication from Ali.
This is our second time to this beautiful location, and it is an absolute favorite! Gorgeous surroundings, very private, and not far from all downtown Glenwood has to offer. We will keep coming back!
We only stayed for a night, but it was a lovely retreat! There is everything you could need at the cabin and it’s close to town. Would definitely recommend! :)
What a wonderful place to relax. The peace and quiet of this cabin is amazing. Turkeys and Deer roaming freely. I had an amazing visit

This was one of my favorite AirBnb stays so far! Beautiful location!! I particularly enjoyed the little hike right on the property and that gorgeous views! The space was cozy, very clean, and thoughtfully stocked - which I always feel makes a stay just that much more comfortable. I really have nothing but good things to say; I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
This place was just what I needed for my vacation. From the gorgeous views to the beautiful nights there. It’s a perfect spot for a couple’s get away.
Great place & loved our stay. Absolutely stunning area.
This cabin was beautiful, peaceful and tucked right in the mountains. Great stay! We thoroughly enjoyed our time here. We'd definitely recommend to anyone who wants a peaceful getaway.
Great cabin with even better views.

We enjoyed our stay and it was very relaxing, we saw some elk on the ridge across the way from the front door. The cabin was not far from Glenwood Springs and the scenery was beautiful. We would definitely recommend the cabin for others to enjoy as well, we will be back.

Ali’s place was really nice. We had winter storms moving in and arrived a little early and she accommodated ￼us. The surroundings are beautiful. There’s plenty to do in town. It was just what we were looking for.
This was hands down one of our favorite stays yet! Ali’s cozy cabin was just perfect in every way and she was a wonderful accommodating host! We definitely look forward to returning soon!
Just tremendous all around. Far exceeded my expectations. 100 percent will be back.
This place is amazing for couples. Great kitchen and living room with amazing views of surrounding mountains. Great place!
Ali’s place was just as expected based on the description! A beautiful little cabin in the mountains, we absolutely loved having a coffee by the fire looking out at the view.
I've been to Colorado a few times, this time was definitely where I connected with nature the most, we had a lot of fun and I totally recommend it!
Great weekend getaway!
great stay! very clean and matched the description. Ali was very responsive and helpful
Beautiful cabin surrounded by the mountains of Glenwood Springs! Such a cozy atmosphere with the fireplace
I had a great time staying at this airbnb! Super private and serene. Would definitely stay here again!
Best airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Will come back again

Outstanding little cabin on the border of “nowhere”…quiet and mostly secluded. Great location for a quiet couples/individual getaway and launching pad for Glenwood Springs and the surrounding region with great access to the highway.
Cozy cabin in a beautiful location, definitely recommend!
This little cabin felt very cozy. I loved the fireplace and the view. This cabin felt very private. There are surrounding homes but at a distances. Definitely recommend a stay here.

This place is amazing!
Peaceful, cozy, and quiet! The best part is about being outside of the cabin and hear the river sound between the mountains!

Wonderful interiors , amazing outside view , drive to the property was not as bad as I imagined it be even good snow .
Overall amazing ..
Second time at the cabin and will be back again. Peaceful location and as cozy as one could ask for. Love it!!
Ali’s place was even more wonderful than the photos show. Absolutely worth the stay!
This was such an amazing get-a-way location! We enjoyed every moment spent in this lovey cabin and could not have asked for a better private way to spend the week, thank you!

A true hidden gem. This mountain getaway cabin is perfect for those looking to getaway, relax and unwind. The views are spectacular! Ali is a fantastic host, very responsive, friendly and glad to help with any questions or concerns. Would highly recommend you stay here if you’re looking to spend some time in Glenwood Springs!

Perfect couples retreat from the normal hustle and bustle to recharge your energy! Just keep going on the gravel road past the private property sign quite awhile before you hit the cabin sign. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Beautiful, private little cabin. Will definitely return!
Clean, comfortable and quiet. Great mountain views on all sides.
awesome little cabin, very cozy and great for a chill weekend, conveniently close to town but also nice and secluded, caught some trout in the creek👌

Beautiful cabin, nestled in the mountains. Absolutely gorgeous
Amazing stay with Ali, would highly recommend to anyone visiting this area. The cabin was clean, accurate, and in a beautiful location. Great amenities too. Can’t wait to stay again!

Everything that I look for in a vacation home I found with one small exception. Things were clean, the place was as I expected from descriptions, plenty of items in the kitchen, and private. The water tasted phenomenal, which in Colorado is important to keep hydrated. This was a fun and unique place to stay.

My husband and I stayed at here for our honeymoon and it was everything we could hope for! The cabin was so cute and cozy and the views around were just breathtaking. We absolutely loved having our own trail up the mountain (it was a bit rough but 1000% worth it for the views). We had the best time ever and honestly never wanted to leave. We will most definitely be back for another trip in the future!

Ali’s cabin is so dreamy! It’s cozy and comfortable. Everything was clean and it’s very well equipped - had everything we needed in the kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. The views are stunning and the big windows really bring the outside in. The decor and the fireplace really give this cabin a vibe. We hit Iron Mountain hot springs, which was only about 15 mins away, and a great place to soak!
Only downside - there is construction happening just a stone’s through away. We’re from the city and we were really looking forward to some quiet time with the sounds of nature. Not as quiet or private as we had hoped. The owners did leave a note about the construction in the cabin with a number to call if it was bothersome (which is thoughtful), but we didn’t feel that strongly about it. It was a minor bummer. Overall, we had a lovely stay!

Ali's cabin offers a truly mesmerizing experience with its great mountain views, providing a breathtaking backdrop to your stay. The sight of majestic peaks against the horizon is a constant source of wonder, making each moment spent inside or outside the cabin an unforgettable memory. Whether you're sipping your morning coffee on the porch or cozied up by the fireplace at night, the mountain views add a touch of magic to your stay, creating a perfect mountain getaway that you'll cherish forever.
We stayed at Ali's cabin for our anniversary trip and it was just as beautiful and peaceful as we hoped it would be!

To start off the pictures do not do justice! This place is sooo beautiful inside and out. As soon as you walk out of the cabin, you see all the mountains, the creek and the apple orchards down the road.
It felt right at home and when it was cold, the fireplace came in handy.
There is so much natural lighting inside of the cabin. The way the place is decorated is very detailed and I loved all the little crystals that were placed in the cabin.
There’s a few neighbors around but still feels private.
After a long day, my fiancé made us steak fajitas as we gazed into the sky full of stars.
There are plenty of stores around and gas stations.
On our last day, we took a hike up the mountains and enjoyed all the beauty nature has to offer. This place is hands down the best Airbnb we have stayed at. It has so much to offer.
This place is fantastic! Incredible views and perfect accommodations. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Beautiful cabin that was cozy and clean! Easy to find l, even in the dark, and was super peaceful with beautiful surroundings. We loved our stay!!

This cabin was so sweet, peaceful, and private. The owner came around once to see if we wanted him to put out the fire pit and some wood for us which was super sweet and we really enjoyed it. We did the hike up to split rock, it’s pretty rough but so worth the views. We can’t wait to stay here again, thank you!
Such a nice, relaxing stay. Everything was spotless and super cozy. The view is amazing. I wish we would’ve stayed longer to get to hike around and sit by the creek. 10/10 highly recommend.
Adorable, extremely clean cabin. This was our favorite stay of the trip. The cabin is very nice and lots of cool spots to walk to. Ali was a great host and extremely easy to work with.
Amazing stay! Private location, cute hike, lovely fireplace. We’d love to stay again.
Stunning and peaceful property. The home was very clean and had everything we needed. We would stay here again and recommend to friends and family.

We loved our stay at Ali’s cabin! The location is just remote enough to be super quiet and relaxing while also being close enough to the roaring fork valley for daily adventures/activities. We really enjoyed hanging out by the creek and grilling out on the back patio in the evening. Overall, a great place for a relaxing and refreshing weekend and we’d love to visit again soon!
This Cabin is a little heaven in Colorado. We had a great time in this lovely place, we would 100% recommend!

Great cabin in a beautiful location. If possible go there for the first time in the day because it's a little difficult if you don't know how far down the road you should go. My only suggestion would be to have the cabin sign with the arrow bigger and if it could light up that would be even better. Would definitely stay again.

I really enjoyed this cabin. Extremely well decorated. The pictures don’t do it justice. It’s everything you could hope for in a mountain cabin stay. Amazing views, cozy cabin, back patio with table and lights. Convenient to Glenwood springs city center. It’s very unique and don’t think there’s another one like this out there. You won’t be disappointed. I would book for a longer stay next time.

Listen, this place was perfect.
My husband and I chose this for our honeymoon and it was magical!
The view was really pretty.
It was quiet and private!

There was plenty of small wildlife about!

There were rabbits, crows, and magpies that visited a lot. All were very docile but stayed pretty close to see from all the beautiful windows.
The only thing that wasn’t too fun was the harvestman spiders that got in and scared the bejeesus out of us when they crawled up on the couch. There was only about three the whole time and they were real docile and were not difficult to let outside!
However, it was still a really great place! It was so perfect and we want to come back on an anniversary another time!
This place is lovely- even better than we expected! Beautiful setting, peaceful, homey and comfortable. I just wish we had another few days there to enjoy it 😊

We really enjoyed this little cabin tucked away. It was peaceful and perfect for a couples getaway. Ali was great at getting right back to us if we had any questions. Place was clean and exactly as described. Almost better in person!! Loved everything about this place and we would come back in a heartbeat. Kitchen is well stocked with everything you need if you want to cook your own meals.
The cabin and location are beautiful. Everything was provided for an easy stay. I would love to return someday!
Beautiful stay!! Very private and our host was very helpful! Definitely would stay here again. 😁
Secluded and beautiful spot. The perfect couples getaway. The cozy cabin has everything you need but may not use because it is so peaceful!
We had a perfect stay hiding in the mountains and had a great hike behind the property in the morning, thank you!
Nice and private! Loved it here will be back
This was a wonderful stay! The house was so beautiful and the location was beyond breathtaking!

Amazing spot just outside Glenwood springs. Ali was nice enough to let us check in early and gave us good recommendations on a little private nature hike just behind the cabin. An amazing spot for a couple looking for a little mountain get away

Has an AC unit and a couple of fans and it was plenty to keep it cool. The kitchen had everything we needed, there were a couple of fans and puzzle and two smart TVs and fast Internet. Remote yet comfortable getaway.

So glad we booked this cabin for our Glenwood Springs stay! The cabin itself is stunning, beautifully decorated, close to town/attractions, and has everything you need. We enjoyed sleeping to the sound of the creek, saw turkeys and their babies on our walk down to the water, and my husband really enjoyed hiking to the top behind the cabin very early in the morning. He said the hike was quite tough (even though short) but the views were amazing. Also really enjoyed going to the nearby Iron Mountain Hot Springs in the evening. Only wish we could have stayed a little longer.

We absolutely loved our stay here! It was so nice to be able to hike and have access to water right where we were staying! Especially visiting Glenwood during a busy season. I was in love with the space inside and being away from town and people. The house is absolutely beautiful and has everything you could need! Wonderfully private, expansive and beautiful- lovely cabin, land and energy!

my husband and i had a wonderful time and felt right at home the moment we came through the door!
