Not to mention some farm fresh eggs were waiting for us! Would highly recommend!

The space was clean and well cared for. Sonja is very proactive and responsive with her communication. If you read through the description, you’ll see that this is a basement of a family home so you will hear footsteps above. The host provided earplugs and a box fan to dampen the sound. If you’re very sensitive to noise then this probably isn’t the place for you. Also the bed is quite firm. If you need a softer mattress then I’d keep that in mind.

Our stay at the Red Mountain Getaway was perfect! The place was clean and decorated nicely. The backyard was beautiful and fun to spend time in shooting hoops. Just around the corner from the house there is a whole trail system for biking/hiking. And the hosts were wonderful, my husband lost his wedding ring in the backyard and they were so quick to help us look for it and connect us with another local with a metal detector who helped us find it. Great place, great hosts, great stay!

We enjoyed our stay in a quiet neighborhood right next to a hiking trail. We were close to downtown and everything we could have needed was in the unit. It’s a place where the host goes the extra step to ensure a great stay with the comforts of home.
Nice place. Walkable to restaurants and hiking trails. Just as advertised

Sonja's place is very clean, sunny, peaceful and home-y. The king sized bed & quality pillows are extremely comfortable. Everything is tasteful and lovely with some fresh eggs waiting for us to boot! She has a 3 ring binder with ALL the local activities and sights. I wish EVERY Air B&B host was this prepared, thorough and hospitable. HIGHLY recommend!
We didn't enjoy the new overcrowded Iron Hot springs pools ("Disney Springs") at least this time of year.... The local SPLENDOR MOUNTAIN SPA was great. So many hikes, great food and walking the creek path was delightful.
We'll be back for sure... thanks again Sonja for such a special stay!
Very nice basement apartment. Was just what we needed for our fishing trip.
Wonderful peaceful apartment. The location is such a short jump to town and close to parks and trails. Great shower after a long day!

Super cute space, perfect for 2 people. Private entrance around the back and dedicated parking for one vehicle. Bed was comfortable and shower hot. You will hear noise above, but that’s clearly noted prior to booking and did not bother us at all. Would definitely come back!

Absolutely an amazing place to stay while visiting this beautiful area!
Our host (Sonja) was extremely friendly and helpful during our stay and we are already looking forward to staying our her lovely home soon.
Really enjoyed our stay! The place was clean and cozy, and the host was very communicative with any questions that we had. Would definitely recommend and return if staying in the area again
Had a wonderful stay. The place was clean and really well-located. Clear instructions and super responsive.

Sonja’s place is cute, tidy, and very well represented by her listing. She was an extremely helpful and responsive host (I had a question early into our stay and it took her minutes to respond) who offered a comprehensive binder of recommendations and info on the area. The best part of all was the complimentary eggs, fresh from her chickens who could be seen from the airbnb! Thanks, Sonja!

Sonja is super helpful, proactively communicative, and flexible. The location is great - walkable neighborhood, a trail a few minutes away, close to the hot springs and downtown. We had everything we needed . Loved the shower stall and the shower itself. The neighborhood is quiet and nestles against a mountainside with great views of the city and the surrounding mountains. Try Slope and Hatch for great tacos at a reasonable price in a cool old building with exposed brick walls.
If you're a light sleeper, use the earplugs that are provided, as you'll hear noise from above in the morning. Sonja warned us and it was not a deterrent for us. We had a great time and appreciated all her help.

We had a really great stay. Easy parking on snowy days. The washer and dryer were fast, accessible, and really helpful especially for ski gear. The farm fresh eggs in the fridge were a thoughtful and nice touch. Walkable to Gland Ave. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

The kitchen is well stocked. The knives and vegetable peeler were high quality (which is rare at most Airbnb spots). The place was exactly as described, and comfortable. Our hosts did a fabulous keeping the path clear. We enjoyed our stay!
Great location, clean, everything you need. Hope to return.

Sonja’s place was very close to the hot springs. Great location! She was extremely responsive and flexible for special needs. The place was exactly like the pictures. The stay felt private and gave a nice mountain cabins vibe, well decorated. I would pick it again next time.

What a great apt. Easy to find and the apt was very comfortable. The bed was almost as soft as our own bed. The amenities were what was posted on the site and Sonja even left fresh eggs for us. I would recommend this and I hope next time we come back to area we can stay here.
Really enjoyed staying here. Had everything we needed.

Sonja's place is a perfect getaway. It's very private with a great view. The location is perfect for hiking, and access and walkability to town for food, etc. The place was put together in a very thoughtful way. The kitchen has some additional items that are so helpful if you want to cook a little. They even have chickens and leave some eggs for you. Thanks for everything! We hope to return.
Sonja was a great host! It was a perfect location for our weekend getaway. Loved the fresh eggs she provided us and it was a quiet, beautiful location, close to everything.

The place was exactly what we were looking for! It is close enough to walk to the main area and a perfect base camp for exploring the area. We did quite a bit of cooking and the kitchen has everything we needed which is nice. They warned about the noise in the morning and do provide earplugs and a white noise machine, wasn’t a problem for us but definitely do hear it. Very accurate description, responsive host and clear instructions for parking and getting in!

We enjoyed the whole setup! The finished basement apartment was really nicely done and had everything that was needed. It was cozy, warm and comfortable. It was close to town and the bike path and great restaurants. We enjoyed the chickens in the backyard and the fresh eggs! The hosts let us put our bikes in the garage for storage between rides and we really appreciated that. Would love to stay there again-highly recommend this rental! 😁

We enjoyed our stay in Glenwood at Sonja’s guest house. It was incredibly peaceful and the backyard was large and spacious for our toddler to run around. It was close to downtown and to the hot springs. The hosts were helpful and responsive and gave great recommendations. We wished we would’ve stayed even longer!
We enjoyed our stay! Beautiful surroundings, comfortable bed, and the kids loved the swing set in the yard. Very responsive and had good recommendations of things to do nearby.

This was a great place for our little family. Our son loved the play structure and Sonja’s mom let him help feed the chickens! Sonja messaged to offer a pack-n-play for our daughter, and just to make sure we knew we could message with any questions at all. The pull-out mattress in the sofa was actually quite comfortable, and downtown was only about a 4-minute drive from Sonja’s place. Highly recommend and will likely be back!

Great place to stay for a getaway in Glenwood Springs. It was really nice to have a kitchen and a large dining table. I entertained guests who were staying at the Lodge and we had fun playing games. The location is conveniently located from restaurants and they are within walking distance.
Great place! Would definitely stay again.

The apartment was set up like family members are visiting. Great location, details available like sun cream, hearing protection and filtered water made this a great apartment to enjoy Glenwood Springs and the beauty of Colorado.

While not in town, Sonja's place was convenient and a very short, easy drive to town. The space is beautifully appointed, comfortable, with very thoughtful amenities. We had no issues with noise from the family above or privacy in any way. Thanks for adding to our delightful time in Glenwood Springs.
Everything was perfect. The communication was smooth and the house was very comfy. We could even have the privilege to enjoy the eggs from their chickens in the back yard! It was a delightful stay.

We enjoyed our time at Sonja’s place.
Reasonable rate, good location and comfortable.

Fast, easy check-in. Clear instructions from host. Very clean and comfortable with well-furnished kitchen. Great location Walked downtown to restaurants and hot springs. Great hiking and biking right from the house. Quiet, peaceful neighborhood. Great view of mountains. Highly recommend.
Cozy sweet place. Good views around. Helpful instructions. Guide/instructions prepared by Sonja very helpful

We walked into Sonja's apartment after 13 hours on the road and immediately felt "at home". Comfortable. You don't get that just anywhere.
I really can't say enough about our stay. We've stayed at several places throughout the years and this was by far our FAVORITE place to stay. We will be back!
Thank you Sonja! Everything was ABSOLUTELY perfect!

We absolutely loved our stay!! A lot of thought was put into making sure the guests are comfortable. The small details from the fresh eggs from the hens to having a frying pan you can actually cook an egg in. Love the coffee and tea options as well. Separate towels for the hot springs, very thoughtful. And so much more. Would definitely stay here again!
Great spot and location

What a great place to stay! Beautiful home and surroundings. Super clean and comfortable. Loved the fresh eggs that Sonja left for us. Close to all Glenwood activities and restaurants. Excellent value and would definitely book again.
Everything was just as described. Very neat and clean. Our hosts were very helpful and friendly. Thanks!

We loved our stay at Red Mountain Getaway! The space was clean and well appointed. Sonja thought of all of the little details to make it a comfortable home away from home. The location was extremely peaceful and quiet, yet we could easily walk to downtown to all of the lovely shops and restaurants. We are already talking about a return trip.
We had a great stay, it was perfect for a couple days to explore Glenwood Springs. Highly recommend staying here.

Perfect stay. Sonja’s place had everything we might need. Super clean and well stocked. I loved the fresh eggs! Communication was great. We were not bothered at all by noise from the upstairs house. We would definitely stay here again!

Although we didn't stay in the AirBnB a lot while we were there, it was a great place to come back to at the end of the day. The host was so nice with always responding to emails and questions. Will definitely stay there again if the opportunity arises. Thank you Sonja!
Cute little downstairs apartment. Perfect for our weekend getaway.
Great location. Great host and prompt response. We had a great week-long stay at their place.
Sonja’s place was peaceful, accommodating and my girls and I appreciated the service we got, As well how close it was to everything was a plus.

This was a very nice apartment attached to the owners home with your own entrance. The apartment was nicely decorated and extremely clean. The host thought of everything from body wash, shampoo, conditioner, suntan lotion to fresh eggs from their chickens. The apartment is a couple mile drive to downtown where there are lots of shops and restaurants. Its also close to 2 Rivers Park which is on the Colorado River. There are also some hiking trails that start about 2 houses down from the apartment. The host is very responsive when emailing and I would definitely recommend this location.
We travel often and this has been the one place that had everything we needed. It is well thought out and she very accommodating. The fresh eggs in the morning was a beautiful touch. We will be back.

The Red Mountain Getaway was great! It was in a nice quiet neighborhood just outside of the downtown area. We were able to walk into town in about 10 minutes, which was great. We will definitely be back!

Beautiful spot and close to Glenwood Springs and less than an hour to Aspen. Host gifted fresh eggs from her chickens in backyard, we’re excellent. Host immediately helped when fuse blew while blow drying hair to rectify it. Would 10/10 recommend this for a nice getaway and good central location

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Red mountain Airbnb property that exceeded my expectations in terms of cleanliness, comfort, and outstanding hospitality. From the moment I booked the accommodation until the end of my stay, the host's attentiveness and responsiveness made my experience truly exceptional. Firstly, the host's communication was impeccable. Sonja promptly responded to all my inquiries and provided detailed information regarding the check-in process, and amenities. Upon reaching the property, I was delighted to find it in pristine condition. Every corner of the accommodation was spotless. Throughout my stay, any minor concerns or questions I had were addressed with remarkable speed.
I wholeheartedly recommend this accommodation to anyone seeking a comfortable and welcoming home away from home.

The place was perfect, exactly as described. Sonja was an exceptional host. She went above and beyond to accommodate our young child by providing extra amenities. We would highly recommend! We would definitely stay there again.

Sonja's apartment is simply wonderful. It is immaculate and there are special touches (including fresh eggs from the family chickens) that makes staying at the Red Mountain Getaway special. Honestly, this will be our go-to spot when we visit Glenwood Springs. Book your stay with Sonja. You won't be disappointed.
This place was warm and welcoming in a beautiful area of Glenwood Springs. The apartment had everything we needed, and Sonja was a great communicator. Fresh eggs were a wonderful touch!
Great getaway location and very homey and welcoming.
It was a great stay. Close to a lot of the places my girlfriend and I wanted to go, and I had something come up and they were flexible, within reason, and overall an excellent experience!

This place is wonderful! Clean and cozy with nice touches everywhere. Bathroom was stocked, which not every Airbnb does but was 1000% appreciated. Close to town, it was a quick 5min drive to the best restaurants. We did hanging lake and rafting this weekend and this location was so close to both.
We had complete privacy and could tell people were upstairs but it wasn’t bothersome at all. Highly recommend!

Great location, beautiful accommodations, generous amenities; washer and dryer a big plus. Backyard hen eggs were delicious and unexpected! Thank you for everything—we highly recommend Red Mountain Getaway!

My young son and I had a lovely visit! Sonja was responsive, so kind and recommended great restaurants as well and lots of things to do. The space was private and quiet and just a short walk into town where we enjoyed the restaurants and shops. The backyard was so peaceful and has gorgeous views, we had fun shooting hoops and visiting with their cute chickens.
Everything in the space was clean and well marked so it was easy to find our way around. Kitchen was well stocked with the basics making it easy to cook meals in.
All in all, we had an excellent stay and can’t wait to come back!

A really great place to stay in Glenwood. The location is fantastic. Right next to downtown but also very relaxing and quiet. Highly walkable and a cozy little place. And as a fun bonus they left some fresh eggs from their chickens for us to have! It was a little noisy in the morning with people above you moving around but Sonja was very up front about that with us so we fully expected that and it did not hinder our enjoyment of our stay. We would highly recommend staying here.
Cute and cozy. Beautiful view and backyard. Comfy bed. Well equipped with everything you need. Hosts were friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay here again!

Very comfortable and pleasant place. We absolutely enjoyed our stay. The guide binder to the house and surroundings made everything super clear and was very informative! We would highly recommend Sonja's place and would certainly book again when we're in the area! Another nice touch were the eggs (of the back yard chickens) that were waiting for us in the fridge.
Sonja's listing was perfect for my getaway in Glenwood Springs. Private, cozy, and in a great location! I would stay here again!
Super spot, Sonja is amazing

Place was conveniently located within minutes of everything from shops/restaurants to attractions. Didn’t realize we booked Easter weekend which made it a little awkward early morning in Easter Sunday.

Sonja was such a great host! Her place was so beautiful and clean. Always ready to help with such a friendly demeanor. Was prompt to respond to my questions and quick to suggest recommendations! Love how homie the little place felt. She made our stay in Glenwood Springs so easy! Will definitely use again!
Great location and very easy experience due to clear communication.
Very close to downtown. Nice neighborhood and friendly hosts

We had a wonderful stay at Sonja’s place. The space was beautifully designed and comfortable along with a well equipped kitchen and very comfy bed. The grounds and views surrounding the house were well maintained and stunning. Short drive to downtown Glenwood and hotsprings, really great restaurants around. Would stay again!

The wife and i were in town for our anniversary! We felt like we were at home in the red mountain paradise! Fully stocked kitchen, pans were great to cook on! we loved the prime tv apps beautiful neighborhood, and it was so easy to check in it felt as if we were just going home! If your looking for sometime to relax check out the red mountain getaway. 5 stars all around thanks sonja!

We love staying at Red Mountain Getaway! The apartment is cozy, comfortable and beautifully decorated! The added amenity of coffee and fresh, “home grown” chicken eggs from the backyard is a special treat!
This was a lovely apartment to stay in. They were very gracious to accommodate us with some special requests as I went through medical treatments. Thanks Sonja!

This little place was a gem! Very clean and cute with the western knickknacks everywhere. Sonja had great communication with me the whole time. Great location as the Hot Springs are right down the street. Highly recommended staying here! Wonderful host!

This is an absolute gem of a place. Centrally located to all unique places in downtown Glenwood Springs. This lovely rental has many little details from a lovely view to the mountains, good quality toiletries, high quality bedding to coffee beans and a grinder to make fresh coffee. We felt spoiled by the good vibes of this home, that has very tasteful furniture and decor. This was the best place for what we were looking, a quiet place rest.

Sonja’s place was perfect for exploring Glenwood Springs even without a car. Short taxi if needed for luggage or groceries. Everything was wonderfully arranged for a short or long stay. Local busses are ready to take you to Aspen. Very enjoyable vacation spot for two.
Lovely, clean home at a great location!
Sonja was a great host and very responsive! The apartment was clean and nice. We really enjoyed our stay.
Great stay in a quiet neighborhood. Lovely backyard with a view and cozy space indoors. We would love to stay again.

We had a great time here. Walking distance to downtown and the Adventure Park. Gorgeous view. We had coffee on the back patio every morning enjoying being surrounded by mountains. Sonja had lots of nice touches, like fresh eggs from the chickens. Highly recommend!

This was an amazing stay. The couch and bed was super cozy. The place was clean. It was everything we needed and more. They gifted us with some eggs from their hens whom you’ll likely be lucky to meet. I would definitely stay here again. :) thanks for everything Sonja!
Lovely place to stay!
We had a great stay at the Red Mountain Getaway. Had great fun riding the bike trails. Easy access to walk into town for breakfast or dinner.

This spot was perfect!!! The Airbnb was easy to find and very clean upon arrival. Check in was seamless with the lockbox. Location was walking distance to all the fun downtown ~20 mins. We were in town for a wedding and it was just what we needed! Thank you Sonja!
Lovely spot. My daughter played on the playground. Peaceful and close to everything.
This place was perfect my son and I to stay while we did day trips in the valley. Very clean and well appointed.

Home was comfortable, clean and well appointed. Great location. Close to town and interstate 70. Lots of restaurants and shopping. Hosts friendly and readily available. Fresh eggs provided from cage free chickens in backyard 😊. Would definitely recommend!!
Loved the little touches! Great place to stay. Fresh eggs from her chickens. Love the place. Highly recommend!
Loved staying here! Sonya was quick to respond if I needed anything or had any questions!! I had everything I needed there and no complaints!

Sonja was a very communicative host and the apartment was cute! We liked the location a lot. However, we could hear every footstep in the upstairs apartment, which didn't make for as relaxing of a stay as we hoped.

I highly recommend the Red Mountain Getaway if you’re staying in Glenwood Springs! This place had all the great basics but it was really the details that set it apart — fresh eggs from their chickens, a detailed handbook with food, shopping, and outdoor activity recommendations, and a stocked kitchen and lots of storage. The wifi was great for working remotely and the bed was super comfy.

We loved our weekend at Sonja’s place! The apartment is just a quick drive or nice walk to downtown Glenwood Springs. Sonja provides a really nice guide with great recommendations on where to eat and what to see. The space itself was clean and had all the amenities in the restroom and kitchen we could need. We loved the selection of board games and that there was a TV in the living room too. Sonja’s great about giving guests a heads up that they may hear some foot traffic from above. Maybe we’re heavy sleepers, but we didn’t hear any noise in the early mornings or evenings. Already planning to come back the next time we head to Glenwood Springs!

This property is exactly as advertised. Lovely, exceptionally clean apartment about a 20 minute leisurely walk downtown. The owners are accommodating and had everything ready for us when we arrived, including a pitcher of ice water. The kitchen had all you might want for a longer stay, the living and dining areas were great for conversation.
We loved our stay at the Red Mountain Getaway - super cute place with beautiful mountain views and close to town.
Quaint, clean, comfortable
Perfect get away
Excellent hosts! Very relaxing stay! The fresh eggs and plums from their tree were a nice touch! Close to everything to see in Glenwood Springs!
Great place to stay in Glenwood. Awesome hosts!
Beautiful home and wonderful location. Loved the mountain views!

Great stay at Sonja’s place! Location was perfectly located just outside Main Street, east 4 minute drive to restaurants and coffee shops. Sonja was a great host and welcomed us with some fresh eggs from her chickens when we checked in. Great view from the patio, highly recommended place if you’re staying in the Glenwood area
Enjoyed our Red Mountain Getaway. Private with a great location. Very cozy and clean. Will need to be back .

This is one of those places that you don't want people to know about. One of the best Airbnbs I've stayed in. Great location, able to walk downtown for dinner and drinks, clean and well designed space with great views. I'm always a little weirded out by apartments with the owners on site but this was easy, private and the foot steps above us was no big deal at all. I've visited Glenwood at least a dozen times and always stayed in hotels but all the conveniences and space in the airbnb makes a great home away from home. I 'll stay here again.
Had a wonderful relaxing stay here. Great views, quiet, and very nice host and family. Very responsive to any requests/needs. Very clean and comfortable unit. Would definitely come again!

We enjoyed our stay. We were very comfortable and it’s in a great location. We met the owner and it was nice to talk to her. They mentioned we might hear footsteps from above but we weren’t bothered by that at all. The air conditioner and sleep machine muffled the noise. So don’t let that keep you from renting this great property! Sonja has thought of everything to make your stay wonderful!

Restful and beautiful accommodations!
I loved the fresh eggs from their own chickens! Very clean and well equipped.
Great place to stay. Clean, quiet, and close to the hot springs and downtown
Beautiful space in a quiet part of Glenwood Springs, just a short walk into downtown. Sonja's place is lovely, clean, comfortable and superconvenient- highly recommend!

Great apartment! Sonja adds a lot of niceties such as fresh eggs from their chickens! Filtered water in the fridge. Bath gel, shampoo, conditioner, ear plugs. Close to the main area of town but still you still feel like you’re in your mountain hideaway. Great hosts!
You will feel like you are at home, everything you might need is available there !
Highly recommended!

I'm so glad I decided to stay here instead of a hotel, this is all around a fantastic place to stay! The location is perfect, very close to downtown and Hwy 82 & I-70. The space was all very clean and welcoming. The bathroom is newly remodeled and the shower is the best. Also I never realized how much better fresh eggs are until Sonja left us some from their hens! I would definitely stay here again!

This was the perfect home base for our adventures around Glenwood Springs. We were able to walk pretty much everywhere—there’s a cute trail close by that zips you right into the center of town! Place was exactly as described. The chickens are so cute!

This is such an awesome place to stay. Sonja communicated clearly, and the space was exactly as described. Everything is clean, cozy, and comfortable. The Red Mountain Getaway was conveniently located to numerous sites and hiking spots in Glenwood Springs while only a short drive to Carbondale and Basalt. In an hour, you can also be in Aspen. The chickens were an added bonus. They were very polite, LOL! Sonja clearly states that they are early risers and we would hear them in their home above the BnB, but it was way quieter than a busy hotel with kids running up and down hallways to the pool. For noise sensitive guests, Sonja provides earplugs and a white noise machine! Can't beat that! We absolutely loved our stay and would happily stay there again.
Great experience staying here for 2 nights. The place was very clean and very well maintained. Location is really good and everything is nearby. Highly recommend staying here.
Very clean and comfortable with great access to downtown.

Sonja is a terrific host, the view from the patio is gorgeous with coffee in the AM or a nitecap in the PM. The bed is very comfortable & the walk in shower is huge and has a soap dispensary that is a very nice touch. She provides all of the supplies to make coffee to your liking, including the beans & grinder! Can’t forget about the complimentary free range eggs provided. She also has many suggestions on things to do in the area. We will definitely stay here again when in town!

We had a marvelous time at Red Mountain. The Airbnb is well appointed and the solid interior design made everything feel easy - we made excellent meals in the kitchen, set lovely tables, watched the Oscars on a great Roku TV, found hikes in their guidebook and got extra suggestions from our hosts directly, the bed was so comfortable, we slept really well, the light inside is really nice from the multi directional windows, the view of the mountain across the yard and river is superb, and it’s quiet from outside traffic. The location was 5 min from everything. Sonja was an excellent host and she answered all my questions during the stay quickly and with great generosity. Finally, we were delighted to receive fresh eggs from the chickens in her yard. What more could we ask for? It was really fantastic.
This was a wonderful airbnb. So much thought and detail went into the space. I highly recommend this place.
Overall an amazing stay. Would definitely return! Clean and perfect!

Great spot near downtown Glenwood. Super quiet expect for a bit of rustling around in the morning - which you let us know about ahead of time. Not a big deal for us. A great place to use as a base for Glenwood Springs adventures or to just hole up for the day. Will stay there again on our next visit. Thanks again Sonja!
This was the perfect stay. The apartment is so inviting. The view was beautiful. Not far from town at all. Highly recommend!!
This is a great place to stay! Sonja communicated very well the whole time.
Great location! The chickens are very sweet.

Just what my wife and I needed. Great location with host available for any issues. Probably the one of the best values in Glenwood Springs. Great location, easily within walking distance of downtown attractions.
Loved our stay!
Will be coming back.
Sonja’s place was perfect for what we needed. Seamless check in, great communication and consideration and easy drive to Aspen. Highly recommend!
Very cozy and very clean. A really nice setup with everything to make you feel at home. Sonja communicated quickly and was very friendly. I would highly recommend to anybody.
Great location close to town, will visit again.

Sonja’s Red Mountain Getaway is a lovely apartment in a very pretty part of Glenwood Springs. It is quiet and peaceful with a tree lined walkway in and view of the large back yard. You wouldn’t know you were that close to the center of town. The apartment is beautifully appointed and the bed really comfortable. You couldn’t ask any more from a host! We would definitely stay there again!
Great place within a few minutes walk to downtown. Hosts are very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!

This is a great step up from the hotels in GSC because of the kitchenette and living room. It is about a twenty minute walk from City center so be aware of that if you're traveling by train! Sonja left us some fresh eggs from her cute chickens and was a very kind and responsive host. We also saw a beautiful deer hanging out in the backyard! This unit is above their home so just be aware of that when booking.

Great place and short 10 min. walk to central Glenwood Springs, the hot springs, and train station. The Hosts were exceptional. Because you are in the lower floor you may occasionally hear some footsteps - but didn't bother me at all. Very private and very clean and comfortable.

Sonja’s place was absolutely perfect for my friend and I’s long weekend stay. It’s walking distance to downtown and in the most convenient location. We had plenty of privacy, the place was very clean, and had everything we needed. Will definitely stay here again if we’re ever back in the area!
Super location. Close to hiking and downtown.
Great location with walking distance to restaurants and shops! Very nice place and very friendly hosts. Loved it and would definitely come back!

Very clean and easy to find. Sonja is very easy to communicate with. Not a great place for quiet but definitely didn't bother me. If you like to be close to town she has a wonderful place to stay. I'd definitely stay there again.

Chickens and fresh eggs. Pick up some butter, bread and sausage or bacon to go with your fresh eggs. Deer walking by in the morning. I was sold on the view from the patio and was not disappointed. Hard to imagine getting to live here everyday. Our second Airbnb and we will be staying with Airbnb locations for our travels. Just a few minutes from downtown. Great restaurants Lucy's and Smokes are both recommended by me. We had a great time.
Great place, quiet, clean and peaceful.

Sonja’s please was great! It’s a huge basement, a big kitchen with lots of appliances and a very comfortable bedroom! We had a great time. It’s located very close from downtown Glenwood Springs in a relaxing neighborhood. I recommend the place and would stay there again!

Such a cute and enjoyable apartment. The view is beautiful, the location is perfect (less than 15min walk to downtown), the apartment was clean and thoughtfully furnished, and the perfect size for us. Sonja spent a lot of time making personalized recommendations when asked, and the binder in the Airbnb had so much useful information in it. Will 100% stay here again on a future trip to glenwood.

This is a lovely apt for two that is cozy, efficient and has a wonderful view. It is so close to main downtown and walking is a breeze. Sonja is quick to respond to questions and cares about what your needs are. We would definitely recommend staying here.
Very nice space and attention to detail - appreciated the full range of coffee and tea options, as well as the complimentary fresh eggs !

Very nice getaway in a quiet neighborhood. We enjoyed having a full, well-equipped kitchen. The bedroom had a comfortable bed and the sleeper sofa was ok. The chickens were surprisingly friendly and entertaining (and the eggs a treat)! The option to drop off luggage before check-in was much appreciated.

If you are traveling to visit the hot springs, Sonja’s Red Mountain Getaway is the perfect place. It is minutes both to the hot springs and the charming downtown of Glenwood Springs. The apartment is cozy and with a full kitchen makes it easy to eat in if desired. The bed is comfortable and the water pressure in the shower is awesome. As if all of this isn’t enough, Sonja is an incredible host who has thought of everything you might need for your stay—including extra towels for the hot springs. We highly recommend staying here.

Sonja's place was great and worked well for our stay - close to town and the hot springs, very clean, everything was as advertised. Very comfortable stay for us, they even provided coffee and a french press, and they havre chickens in the backyard! So they shared their fresh eggs with us. A very good value, we'll be back!
Ray and Kris

Good jumping off point for Glenwood Springs area. The apartment is below a single family home, so it is mildly private. You can walk to the restaurants, and it is close to a park by the river. Fun chickens in the backyard and some fresh eggs in the fridge. The kitchen is usable with all the needed tools.
wonderful place for a quiet getaway! love the chickens!

We had the best stay at Sonja’s place! It was cozy, clean and such a beautiful view from the little private patio. We also Loved all the chickens in the yard…So much fun watching them every day and also got to eat some fresh eggs! The bed was huge and comfortable and there were all the basics and everything you would need for cooking provided which was really nice. The location really could not get any better. We brought our bikes with us and just biked or walked everywhere. It was within 1 mile of everything you can do downtown, including the hot springs. Also being so close to the river was awesome. We loved walking down to where the two rivers meet and enjoying the water and watching all the rafters. All in all it was a great stay and we highly recommend it!
The location is excellent and the hosts very friendly. Highly recommend!

simple complete accommodations, both convenient for playing in the many local sites or cozy up indoors to get some work done

Awesome place to stay! We stayed here for an event at Sunlight Mountain which was only a 5 minute drive. This place was very clean and had all the amenities shown in the description. We had a great stay there! It was very clean and cozy.
We had a lovely stay at this cute cottage. There was quick communication with the host and a seamless check-in. We would definitely stay again. It had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay.
Secluded cottage in a beautiful setting. Quiet and serene. Nicely equipped. Dinner on the deck an extra treat.
Spectacular place. We screwed up our schedule and stayed an extra day by mistake and Chris was very gracious in accommodating our situation.
Hummingbird haven on the back porch every night. A perfect, fresh air, cozy cabin and lots of nature nearby to explore. We had a blast!
Cris' place is clean and comfortable and very peaceful! We would definitely stay there again!
Great place to stay in Glenwood Springs! We enjoyed our time at this cabin. The amenities were perfect.

Great stay at Cris's cabin! I took my girlfriend to Glenwood to propose to her at the top of Independence Pass and we used the cabin as a home base for a week. We really enjoyed being outside of town a little but not too far. 10/10 would recommend.
Very nice cozy cottage up in the mountains away from the hustle bustle of the city. Highly recommended!
We loved this cabin! Very clean, spacious, peaceful, and well-equipped! Highly recommend it and would stay again without hesitation

AMAZING place. I stayed two nights with my boyfriend as a home base as we explored and hiked around the area and it was always great to get back to the cottage, have a fire, and sleep. The creek provides a really nice white noise while you’re outside.
Awesome place, super relaxing and a well built little cabin!

Beautiful cottage, very quiet and peaceful. Cris is a great host he checked in on us once we arrived and was very quick to answer any questions. The bed was very comfortable. The shower with twinkling stars was an added bonus that we loved! Definitely stay here if you want a cozy stay in a beautiful town.
Beautiful place and great area. Very peaceful and relaxing.
Cutest cottage! Such a wonderful stay in a beautiful area

Had a great weekend here with my partner! It was quiet and private, and Cris was both easy to communicate with and very helpful. Definitely reccomend this spot to anyone who wants a relaxing weekend!
Had a great stay here - very relaxing cottage off of the beaten path! Clean, quiet, and charming!
Chris place is Amazing! The views from the cottage is stunning and its clean, comfortable, and very modernized. Looking forward to going back and renting again.
Awesome place highly recommend

Perfect place close to everything downtown. Walked to the courthouse where I was working. Perfect.
Awesome spot. Quiet yet very close to everything central

It was really well situated! We could do everything walking. Parking is easy. The bed is in a very cute alcove (not completely separated), the apartment is very cute and functional, and quiet (despite being downtown!). One of the cleanest AirBnB I have been in. Highly recommended.

We loved staying in this cute little house! It was within walking distance of our favorite Glenwood Springs restaurant and an easy walk across the pedestrian bridge to Glenwood Hot Springs. We are definitely coming back!

This is my second stay at Old Yeller and it was even better than the first because I felt so at home. I tried to come to Glenwood previously but Greg’s place wasn’t available so I just would find a time when it was. The location and price make it the only place I’ll ever stay there! Being able to walk to the springs, the caves and so many great restaurants makes it a perfect stay!
It was great and perfect location!

Greg gave good detail on the house and the what the do’s and don’t’s were in the house since it is older. We would go back anytime!

Instructions should have included how to lock the door with the code. It was much different than our coded deadbolt. We had to contact the host. Great stay, would return.
Wonderful place close to downtown! Easy in/out, walkable to the hot springs, and close free bus rides to areas further out. Great stay!
Great place to stay if you want to walk to restaurants and the hot springs. It was perfect for what we wanted in Glenwood Springs.
Great little house in a super accessible part of Glenwood Springs! Easy access to the hot springs and some great restaurants in the area! Would highly recommend :)
It was pleasant. Also a thought provoking experience staying in the original tiny house of 1800s. I would recommend it to a friend.
Simple and easy.

Location is everything! Very walkable and super clean, easy door code entry, but a late 1880s home downtown Glenwood comes with a few caveats. No parking except blocks away in free public lot, some noise outside due to traffic & restaurants, but overall a funky, sweet, updated, enjoyable 19th century stay for us. We have to cook our meals (pro athlete) so the fully-stocked kitchen was a huge win. Easy indoor storage for our mtb bikes. Heat is wall-hugging baseboard setup + one electric oil radiator. LOVED IT. leelikesbikes dot com
This is the perfect location for a Glenwood Springs getaway. Walkable to EVERYTHING in the downtown area--including amazing restaurants, shops and attractions.

Old Yeller was cute, well appointed, very charming, and an easy walk to everywhere downtown. The hosts responded quickly, were very friendly and helpful. We usually found a parking spot on the street, and only had to go to a free parking lot one time, but it was super close. All around enjoyable stay!
Great little space. Perfect for three people. I especially enjoyed how close it is to local restaurants and entertainment. Definitely worth the price!

The location is really outstanding! Very easy walking distance to Glenwood's best restaurants and shops. There's no dedicated parking but parking close was easy and free. The place is cute, but I think "completely remodeled" is a bit overstated. The kitchen is small and functional but nothing special. The bathroom is modern enough but very tiny - there's barely enough room to hang one towel. It would help to have some additional hooks or even a towel bar just outside the door. The WiFi and TV are fine. There's a drawer full of DVDs but the player would not work. But we had no problem streaming from Hulu. The place could some updating of lighting and furniture. For example, there's a good old vanity and mirror but no good light near it. The bed isn't bad but could be a lot better, plus needs better lighting. Considering the total price for 2 nights with fees & taxes was over $300/night, I'd say it's a decent value, particularly if you take advantage of the kitchen to save on meals.
Terrific location, a block from the train station, and everything downtown was 3 blocks away at the most. Nicely updated space; perfect for a couple.
Second time I’ve stayed here and hope to visit again! Perfect little home base for your trips around the area.
Good location, cute place.
Great location, walkable to everything downtown including bike trail. Comfortable for 2 of us and good kitchen to make to make all your meals for a more budget focused vacation.
Ol' Yeller was a lovely home away from home for our family on our recent trip to Glenwood. Couldn't beat the location! Would recommend!
We had a great stay at Old Yeller. Perfectly placed in downtown Glenwood. Hosts were amazing and made us feel right at home.
Great place for an incredible price! Lots to do in walkin distance!

Charming cottage in great location, walkable to almost everything. Best for guests who appreciate older, historic lodging. A bit pricey for what you’re getting, but worth it for the location. All in all, a charming place to stay.
This is a fantastic location that is amazing for the value. The place is perfect for anyone staying in Glenwood springs who wants a simple place within walking distance from tons of stuff.

We appreciate how quiet the house felt Especially given how close it is (1 block) from busy grand ave. Huge that we can park for FREE only a few blocks away.
FYIs - be mindful of electrical! Can't run the microwave AND the toaster without blowing the breaker. Fridge seems off - everything froze or had ice crystals. Pillows are pretty uncomfortable (wish I'd brought mine from home)

This was a great little place in walking distance of coffee, restaurants, and shops. The street was so quiet and lovely! The house had old charm but was modernized and very clean. My daughter and I greatly enjoyed our stay.
Our stay was perfect! The home is clean, safe and close to restaurants, coffee and shopping. You are walking distance to Glenwood Hot Springs pool and Iron Mountain Hot Springs. Highly recommend!
Old Yeller was the perfect central location for our Glenwood Spring adventure. We rented a car but really didn't need it except for when we drove to the Hanging Lake trail. Definitely recommend!

Fantastic location. So close to absolutely everything! We walked everywhere. The parking garage is down the street and it’s free and has a ton of spaces. The house is cute and matched the description, although we didn’t realize it was a duplex and there was someone else on the other side of the wall. We were very confused when we heard people talking and making noise through the wall.
Great little studio house! Perfect for the two of us. Close to a lot of things. Parking is kinda a pain when all the downtown spots are taken, but there’s a parking garage a couple blocks away.
Our stay was amazing! It is in a very convenient location and is perfect for two people and a quick weekend trip.

Very nice small place to stay... parking could be an issue if you were planning on walking around town... we got up early and was gone most of the day fishing and site seeing so 2 hr parking during work hours was not a problem for us.
Staying at Old Yeller was very much enjoyable. The quaint, bungalow style house was exactly what we were looking for.

Beautiful, cozy little house. It was great having the kitchen available. The location was great. Easy walk into town and to most of the local restaurants. The place was clean and well-organized. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. Hosts were friendly and amiable. Would absolutely stay again. Thank you so much!
We really enjoyed our stay!! :)
Great location right in the heart of downtown Glenwood. Walkable to local restaurant and the hot springs. Would definitely stay here again!
Our new favorite staycation! The house and glennwood are perfect
Really enjoyed our stay! Will definitely book again if we come back to Glenwood Springs:)

This little house is so cute and cozy. We were able to walk to downtown within minutes. We were able to find a place to park on the street with very little issues, we only had to move our car a couple times for the 2 hour limit n front of the house. Right across the street there is street parking with no time limit if you can find a spot. The size of the place is perfect for just 2 people. We had plenty of towels and blankets. The small A/C does a decent job of cooling off the place. We relaxed on the porch chairs and watched all the people in the active neighborhood. The door lock is easy to get in and out of. Greg gave us some discount codes for some of the activities close by that we took advantage of. Grocery shopping is very close; which made it easy to buy our own food for meals in the house. Everything we needed to cook was provided in the kitchen. We enjoyed our stay in Old Yeller and look forward to our next stay.
This a great little place. Great location. Parking is tough. I would recommend this place for sure. Thanks Greg!

Ol’ Yeller is a easily accessible home in the city of Glenwood Springs with Hosts who are amazingly responsive and pro-active with everything we required. They provided wonderful places to eat and the cost was a bargain particularly with the time of year we visited. We hope to use the house again in the future. I highly recommend any available openings the hosts provide.

I liked Greg, he was friendly and responsive. I didn't like it that I had to ask for the door code and got it last minute.
The house was old, dingy, and very small. Basically one room. total. The toilet is 3' from the bed. Front door frame needs weatherstripping badly, AC is an old window unit- if you are worried about security, that could be a problem. The parking is a problem, we got a ticket for parking on the street and there is no driveway.
The kitchen and porch were very nice. The location is great- you can walk to downtown easily, a real bonus in a town without enough parking. The street is pleasant and quiet.

Lovely cottage right in the heart of town. A very walkable area with great restaurants and shops. The place was clean and as described. The host was responsive and proactively helpful. Overall a great place!
The location couldn’t we better! The front patio table was great to hand out & have a relaxing beverage at the end of the day.

House was a perfect location to downtown and the springs. Always nice to have a comfy bed too.

The location is perfect. It is less than a 5 minute walk from the train station. You are walking distance to everything. We arrived by train so walked to all the sites and things to do. It is a very walkable town. There are a number of shops and restaurants nearby.
We absolutely loved the cabin! It was perfect for us for the few days we were in town. Everything we wanted to do was within walking distance! We are looking forward to coming back!

I had a great stay at Old Yeller. The location is killer - just a block or two walk away from tons of restaurants, bars, and shopping. This was disappointing as we have a toddler who goes to sleep early and would have enjoyed a separate room. We told Amber about this, and she said she would be updating the listing. As an added bonus, Matt and Amber's daughter was able to babysit for us! If you're looking for a studio in the heart of downtown Glenwood Springs, give Old Yeller a look.

I'm in love with Old Yeller. Just imagine the perfect little, quiet bungalow that somehow still manages to be in the middle of everything. I paid for two nights what I would have paid for one at a local hotel, and this was sooooo much better! Despite needing to park a block or so away from the property for overnight parking, it was still very close and manageable! In fact, had it not been for the little parking lot walk, I would not have seen the Episcopal church selling homemade pies as a fund raiser!!! Perfect stay in Glenwood Springs, with a wonderful apple pie to go! I can't recommend Old Yeller enough!
Exactly as described. Easy walk to shops and restaurants, cute little house that's very comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful little house in the middle of Glenwood Springs - it was a perfect stay!

Great location for walking to some of the best restaurants in town. Front porch was nice for enjoying a cup of coffee (remember to bring your own Keurig pods or grinded - filters are provided). What a treasure! Cute place for a couple, right in the middle of everything. Great restaurants and shops close by, easy walking to the pool and vapor caves. The house itself was charming and clean. Very comfy bed and sofa. Lovely place!

It was such a nice place to stay. So adorable. The lilac tree was in full bloom and the patio was lovely. We used the sofa sleeper and it was surprisingly very comfortable. Downtown restaurants bars and shops were just a short walk away and the local attractions were close. Parking was easy. We really enjoyed the getaway!
Beautiful home with a great location! I would highly recommend it to anyone.
What a cute little place super close to downtown Glenwood! It was really quiet and comfortable. Highly recommend for 1-3 people!

Greg’s place is perfect for a getaway to Glenwood Springs. It’s right in the heart of town and walkable to many restaurants and bars, but still located on a peaceful neighborhood street. Great little place. Perfect location.

The BnB was so close to all the shops uptown, but far enough away we didn’t hear any traffic. It was such a cute little home. If we ever travel to Glenwood Springs again we will definitely be staying at Old Yeller.
We had a great weekend in Glenwood Springs at Greg's place. It's quite cozy, but matched our expectations and was convenient walking distance to downtown.
The house was perfect! Loved that it was right down the street from shopping and dining, and it was close to the hot springs! Hope to stay here again some day!

Great little spot in the heart of Glenwood. The bed was very comfortable and the place had everything we needed for a long weekend stay. The best of Airbnb! Walking distance to restaurants, shops, and parks. Perfect place if you want to enjoy the springs or skiing. We loved it.

Wonderfully Walkable downtown Glenwood! Its for sure more of a studio with no bedroom door so great for a couple. This place is perfect, close to every restaurant downtown. The Hot Springs is nearby.
It was a great place to stay and hosts very responsive.
A cozy little cottage. Cute as a bug's ear! Adequate accommodations, adequately supplied kitchen, comfy to hang out in.

Beautiful place in the world. Lovely views every time you step outside and so much to explore on foot. The house was comfortable and warm, considering the age of the property we stayed cozy inside on cold (for us) fall days.
Oldyeller is located close to downtown restaurants pubs just a fun place centrally located to all the fun.
Excellent place to stay. Location was great. Everything is within walking distance. Would stay again.

Our stay was great, it was right near the beautiful mountainous views of Boulder, CO. Kind of expected it to be a detached unit or studio, not on the side of someone's home, but it was otherwise quite private and quiet (save for a few creaks now and then upstairs). Nice library and warm heater.
very pretty place in a good area in glenwood springs! Close to downtown, and in an ideal location.
This was the perfect spot to enjoy downtown Glenwood Springs. It was super-easy to access with everything we needed for a weekend trip.

Great place to stay! It was perfect size for 3 sisters, it was more of a studio than one bedroom but it was pretty roomy! The house is was the perfect size for 2 people. The location is great just a block away from the train station if you arrive by train. Great location so close to everything we could just walk! It is a cute and cozy cottage and we loved staying there!

As described, Old Yeller is a nicely renovated, little old home. Best shower we had this trip (clean, plenty of hot water, good pressure). great location, walkable to everything in downtown Glenwood Springs. Small but efficient space with everything we needed. highly recommend The Pullman for dinner... just around the corner.

Great location and really enjoyed the area! The outdoor seating was perfect!

Very cute little yellow house on a quiet street within an easy walk of the pool, and many restaurants and shops. Very comfortable stay for a family of three with one on the pull-out couch.

I would recommend this place to anyone! The kitchen and bathroom were immaculate, the mattress was super comfortable… and the location?! Unbelievable! Walking distance to the hot springs resort, the Doc Holliday trailhead, the Amtrak station and downtown (restaurants, shops and coffee). Perfect location and we will be back!

This was a really cute house, right in the heart of town. It was clean, well maintained, and had everything we needed. Check-in was easy and there was plenty of free parking nearby. I would definitely recommend staying here if you're planning a trip to Glenwood Springs!

This is such a cute house. We loved how close to everything it was. There is a hike/bike trail called The Scout trail a few blocks away which has a beautiful view of Glenwood and you don't have to go very far on the trail to enjoy it.
There are so many restaurants and stores literally around the corner so we didn't have to drive much.
We did end up driving to the Glenwood Hot Springs pool because we had a lot of stuff but it's not far of a walk over the bridge. We appreciated the pool towels because otherwise you have to rent them there.
The house is very homey and the kitchen has the basics you would need for a simple meal. Fyi, bring your own coffee though as that wasn't provided.
The house is really quiet and we didn't hear any outside noise. Parking was pretty easy and
we could usually find a spot out front or within a 2 min walk at the most.
I would highly recommend this house for a couple or very small family. My 10 year old son and I very much enjoyed our little home away from home :)

This house is very convenient to everything in town! Instructions were very helpful as well. Both the bed and sofa bed were comfortable (loved how soft the sheets were!). The outside patio table and umbrella were nice for relaxing too.

Old Yeller is a very charming, comfortable home in a fantastic location. It has everything you need and is easy walking distance from many restaurants and shops in downtown GS. We had a great stay!

The stay here at Old Yeller was amazing. The location is right in the downtown Glenwood area and everything was within a short walking distance. We stayed here for our anniversary and it was perfect size for a couple. Check in and out were seamless and it was super clean when we came in . Definitely would recommend!
What a perfect place to fall in love with a perfect town
This is a lovely little house very close to the main street. we walked everywhere we wanted to go. Perfect accomodation for a quick weekend getaway. we had no complaints at all.

Perfect spot in the heart of downtown Glenwood. Walk to everything you need. The house is charming and perfect for a couples get away. We really enjoyed our stay. Greg was communicative and helpful. Full recommend for Old Yeller!

Once again, this home was absolutely perfect for our Glenwood getaway. Cozy, quaint, and extremely close to all our favorite places in the downtown area. Literally, could not pick a better place to stay. We will be back for thirds. 😊

This is a great little spot to stay - a block or two away from the main drag, meaning it’s easy to get to restaurants and stores but you’re not right in the middle of tourist traffic. If you come via Amtrak as we did, it’s super-convenient. Just a short walk down the street to/from the station. We loved sitting on the front porch or at the table in the yard. Very homey all ‘round. The Hot Springs are a short walk away via the pedestrian bridge, and we appreciated the nice towels provided for our use.

Great little house close to everything in Glenwood. The owners have done a great job remodeling this old home. The house is very small, but it was perfect for my wife and I. The area is quiet and beautiful. As the owner mentions in the description, even though there is only parking in front of the house from 6 pm - 9 am there are plenty of places to park within a block of the house. We were able to find a spot less than a block away across from the bookstore on the corner.
Cute place that is close to downtown but doesn’t feel crowded
Loved this place! Everything is in walking distance and if we had to drive everything was about 5 minutes away. Will definitely be looking forward to come back!

The Old Yeller exceeded our expectations. The location couldn’t be better, the space was amazing and communication with the host was great! This will be our first choice on future Glenwood Springs visits.
We loved this place! Great location in town with so many options within walking distance. Highly recommend
Great central location, loved the beautiful blooming lilac in front with comfortable padded porch chairs. We enjoyed the front patio table for happy hour and games. I'd come back!
This was in a perfect location, which a perfect set up for our quick stay. Would definitely use it again!

We had a great time in Glenwood Springs and so much of that was due to our stay at old yeller. The location was simply perfect. It was tucked just enough away from downtown to offer some quiet yet close enough to be incredibly convenient. We walked everywhere. Just two blocks to lots of great restaurants and the river walk. It is super close to the river walking bridge so we were able to walk to the hot springs. My husband also brought his bike and was able to enjoy going on great rides specifically “4 mile rd.” Check-in/out was a breeze. I would stay here again!

Beautiful, cozy little historic home that is steps away from everything in Glenwood Springs. Home was clean and self check-in was pain free. Host communicated in a timely manner and just made our weekend trip simple. Thank you Greg!

Our stay was absolutely perfect!!! The place looks exactly like the pictures- charming, clean, and cozy. All the appliances we used worked great. We loved being in walking distance from everything. We definitely want to stay here again some day, thank you for the amazing stay!
Great location. Easy access to downtown. Clean. Well maintained. Comfortable.

We loved staying in the cute air bnb. Its perfectly located within two blocks of shopping, train station, & the pool. This adorable place was super clean and comfortable. I will definitely stay here again and refer this place to everyone i know. We loved sitting on the porch every night and just relaxed and enjoyed
good location., easy to find. and very comfortable
Very charming house in a great downtown location. It was a perfect place to stay for a weekend getaway.

This place is a find. a whole house (though a small house) in downtown with easy access to restaurants, the hot springs and the central business district. Check in couldn't be easier, and the place is completely furnished. The house has everything reasonably needed for a comfortable stay. The hosts are very responsive and helpful, even having some discounts for some of the local attractions. Can't wait until my travels take me back to Glenwood Springs and the ol' Yeller House.

The house is super cute, and the perfect location. It's so nice to be able to just walk everywhere you need to go. Inside is great as well - functional kitchen, comfortable bed, good shower. The hosts were extremely communicative and helpful during my stay as well. Would come back!

Great location walking distance to brewery, downtown, restaurants, bars, and a longer but doable walk to the hot springs so you don't have to hassle with parking. Charming, open plan cottage--bring slippers to make yourself more comfortable.
It was cute and what a perfect location!

We had the best time here!! It is small, VERY clean, and walking distance to everything you could possibly want. We enjoyed having our coffee on the porch in the mornings and adult beverages in the evenings. Super peaceful and we will definitely stay here again!
Sunny cottage right near everything!
Great place. Restaurants just right there. Will stay here again!

This place is perfect for a couple in Glenwood. It's a couple blocks from downtown. There are multiple coffee shops within 2 minutes of walking. Everything was clean and checkin was easy. Nothing more that you can ask for.
Great stay! Great location and home was clean and as advertised.

This place is clean and charming. It’s the perfect location to walk around town, walk to the Glenwood Hot Springs, or catch a shuttle or drive up to Sunlight Mountain. The hosts communicate timely and well. We can’t wait to come back next winter!!
We loved this location, quiet at night yet close to restaurants and shops.
Everything during our stay was great- we hope to stay here again next time we’re in Glenwood!
This place was great!
Perfect little spot downtown. Walking distance to everything. Only downside was parking.

Old Yeller was just perfect. Great size for just two adults, location was perfect to walk around everywhere and parking was nearby as well.
Would recommend this for a quiet get away for anyone!
Fantastic little house close to all the best restaurants and downtown. Clean and cozy and modern, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Small but cozy!
Great Location, Private, Super Clean.
This is a great place to stay right in downtown Glenwood Springs. Very clean, easy check in and check out procedures and great hosts! I highly recommend it!
It was a very nice and cozy stay! The location is in town so we walked to most places which we enjoyed.

'Old Yeller' is a great place to stay for a winter getaway in Glenwood Springs. For something different, we chose to take the California Zephyer from and to Denver Union Station. 'Old Yeller' is a couple of short blocks from the train station which made it perfect for this trip. We used Lyft to get to the Iron Mountain Hot Springs and took the short walk across the bridge to the Glenwood Hot Springs Pool. 'Old Yeller' is also just a block from great restaurants and fine shopping. We really enjoyed the quaintness of a house built in the 1880 during a time when mining, agriculture, and trains were the way of life in this historic city. 'Old Yeller' gets 5 stars from us. Enjoy!
Great place in a great little mountain town. This place is right in the heart of downtown.
Cozy home in a perfect location next to all the restaurants and bars. Short walk to the Glenwood Hot Spring and great price!!
Nice space for two, amazing location, tons of good food and the hot springs pool within 10min walk
We absolutely love this place! It was so perfect and located just exactly where we wanted to be in Glenwood. Clean and quaint. Thank you for letting us stay!
Located perfectly downtown. Short walking distance to many attractions, quiet and quaint for family fun or cuoples time. Great communication with manager. Most enjoyable!!!
Very nice and comfortable
This was our second time staying at old yeller. You can’t beat the location and coziness. Our 7 year old loves it so much. Everything walking distance! Clean, convenient & charming!

Super cute and located perfectly! We could walk to all the restaurants and cute little shops we had been told to visit. Iron Mountain Hot Springs and Glenwood Caverns Adventure Park are a 3-4 minute drive. I know it says parking may be hard sometimes, but we got lucky and always had a spot right outside the cottage or just around the corner. Would definitely recommend to friends and would also stay here again in the future!
Cute house in the perfect location in town! Had a wonderful time
It couldn’t have been any better.
Cute studio in a great location. Walking distance to downtown, pedestrian bridge to the big hot springs pool.

Such a nice, quaint airbnb! The location in regards to town is amazing. There were many brochures and lists inside of the house with things to do. I did reach out to the owners with a question and they responded very quickly and were super helpful, even offering to give us more ideas to do around town. This place was a perfect place to stay for my first time in Glenwood springs :) would stay there 1000x more!

Unfortunately, I did not feel safe during my brief visit to this Airbnb. As a solo female traveler, safety is paramount for me, and the location's isolation, lack of privacy, and dim lighting outside exacerbated my concerns. Despite my efforts, I couldn't locate the key box, and upon arrival, discovering the RV door open only heightened my unease. Ultimately, I made the decision to prioritize my safety and booked a last-minute hotel for the night. I hope the host takes steps to improve safety measures and provide clearer instructions for future guests, especially solo female travelers.
